T02TD1853E:1b-1: dva kra ma tattva bh'a wan n'a ma mu kh'a ga ma /
T02TD1853E:1b-3: rim pa gnyis pa'i de kho na nyid bsgom pa zhes bya ba'i zhal gyi lung /
T02TD1853E:1b-4: thams cad mkhyen pa [dd] la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1853E:1b-5: dpal ldan bde rdzogs zab gsal gnyis med 'od zer ldan //
T02TD1853E:1b-6: de yi rang bzhin zhi ba bcu drug phyed cha 'bar //
T02TD1853E:1b-7: don dam snying po de ston bla ma gsum zo rab //
T02TD1853E:1b-8: de la bya byed gsum mnyam pa yis rtag tu 'dud //
T02TD1853E:1b-9: 'jig rten gsum gyi sgron ma kun gyis rab bsngags pa //
T02TD1853E:1b-10: chos rnams kun gyi snying po dngos po'i de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1853E:1b-11: srid pa'i dug chu zlog byed gsum khong wam steng 'bar //
T02TD1853E:1b-12: 'jam dbyangs bla ma'i lung gis rtogs phyir bshad par bya //
T02TD1853E:1b-13: dbus kyi yul chen kha bir grong khyer rdo 'jog tu //
T02TD1853E:1b-14: bzang po seng ge zhes byar grags pa rab thob pa //
T02TD1853E:1b-15: bla ma de ni mnyes byas lung thob gzhung mang thos //
T02TD1853E:1b-16: de la rnam dpyad rig 'byung sh'i len na lendrar //
T02TD1853E:1b-17: yon tan bshes gnyen zhes bya rigs can de yi ngor //
T02TD1853E:1b-18: blun blos rab tu byed pa phyogs 'ga' rtsom byed pa'i //
T02TD1853E:2a-1: pas der gnas rnams la gzhung des phan gdags par //
T02TD1853E:2a-2: bsams nas der gnas rtsom dang ston sogs rab tu byas //
T02TD1853E:2a-3: de nas yon tan kun 'byung au rgyan yul du bgrod //
T02TD1853E:2a-4: 'jog sgeg rdo rje zhes byar mtshan gsol rab tu grags //
T02TD1853E:2a-5: de la mang thos rnam par dpyad cing de nyid du //
T02TD1853E:2a-6: gu ne nu grags bla ma de yang mnyes byas te //
T02TD1853E:2a-7: lung thob gnas de'i byang phyogs chab sgo bdag / dz'a thig dza la zhes bya'i bu mo bcu drug pa //
T02TD1853E:2a-8: lakshm'i chen mo mnyes byas zla ba brgyad kyi bar //
T02TD1853E:2a-9: de yi lung ni rab thob mnos nas grub pa thob //
T02TD1853E:2a-10: de nas dz'a landha ra ra grong khyer ko no dzer //
T02TD1853E:2a-11: phyin nas b'a li p'a da zhes byar grags pa rab thob gang //
T02TD1853E:2a-12: mnyes byas gzhung thos lung ni mang du thos gyur nas //
T02TD1853E:2a-13: lho phyogs nam mkha'i shing ldan kong ka na ru bgrod //
T02TD1853E:2a-14: grub pa'i dbang phyug b'a li p'a dar rab grags pa //
T02TD1853E:2a-15: rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i slob ma'i tshogs dang rab tu bcas //
T02TD1853E:2a-16: de kun yo byad gos zas nor rgyun gyis sbyor ba //
T02TD1853E:2a-17: bla ma dam pa de drung lo dgu rab tu btud //
T02TD1853E:2a-18: 'dus pa'i rgyud chen 'grel bcas bco brgyad rab tu mnyan //
T02TD1853E:2a-19: bdag gis ma rtogs bla ma chen pos de bzhin gsungs //
T02TD1853E:2b-0: 'dir ma rtogs par gzhan ni don med par @2b bsams nas //
T02TD1853E:2b-1: glegs bam mgul btags byang phyogs yul du rab bgrod de //
T02TD1853E:2b-2: rdo rje gdan rgyab ku ba rtsa zhes bya ba'i tshal //
T02TD1853E:2b-3: stag dang dred sogs mang zhing shin tu 'jigs pa'i sar //
T02TD1853E:2b-4: zla ba drug gnas pa yis chos rnams de nyid rtogs //
T02TD1853E:2b-5: sbrul pa'i dge slong bla ma gnyis dang bcas dang phrad //
T02TD1853E:2b-6: mgo dang lag gnyis yol dang tshes brgyad rgyal la bab //
T02TD1853E:2b-7: ston zla ba'i tho rangs skya rengs shar dus su //
T02TD1853E:2b-8: 'jam dpal dbyangs kyis dkyil 'khor 'khor lor sbrul pa la //
T02TD1853E:2b-9: bdag gis don 'di blang phyir gsol ba rab tu btab //
T02TD1853E:2b-10: khyod ni sems can kun gyi yab ste yum yang yin //
T02TD1853E:2b-11: khyod kyis bdag la sogs te 'jigs pa che las skyobs //
T02TD1853E:2b-12: 'gro ba'i dbang po rje btsun khyod kyis sdug bsngal sel //
T02TD1853E:2b-13: khams gsum stod byed chi ba che khyod skye bo skyongs //
T02TD1853E:2b-14: thog ma med khyod nga ro thigs pa'i steng cha med //
T02TD1853E:2b-15: rdze btsun yid med bdud rtsi rab dga' bde btang byed //
T02TD1853E:2b-16: 'gro la phan phyir bde bas sangs rgyas rnams kun la //
T02TD1853E:2b-17: rab dgyes bde ba'i mgon chen khyod kyis gtang bar mdzod //
T02TD1853E:2b-18: skyon gyis ma gos bla na med pa'i byang chub lam //
T02TD1853E:2b-19: sna tshogs sdug bsngal zhi mdzad skom pa ngoms mdzad cing //
T02TD1853E:2b-20: 'khor ba dpa' klong thar mdzad bde la 'god mdzad pa //
T02TD1853E:2b-21: dngos kun rgyal bas mi dpogs lam 'di bstan par mdzod //
T02TD1853E:2b-22: zhi ba'i zhi ba rdul dang rab bral 'dzum pa spangs //
T02TD1853E:2b-23: bsgom pa las 'das mkha' 'dra dri mas ma gos pa //
T02TD1853E:2b-24: sgyu ma kun 'das 'dod pa kun la rgyab kyis phyogs //
T02TD1853E:2b-25: de 'dra'i rje btsun khyod la bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1853E:2b-26: dregs med 'jigs med byang chub chen po thob kyi bar //
T02TD1853E:2b-27: 'khor bar 'tsho bar 'jig rten dmyal rtsub ma lhung bar //
T02TD1853E:2b-28: khyod gsung dam tshig sdom pa thun mong ma yin rnams //
T02TD1853E:2b-29: bdag la sogs pa rtag tu rab tu bskyang bar bgyi //
T02TD1853E:2b-30: gar chen rnam par rol pas gar mdzad cing ;
T02TD1853E:2b-31: / sna tshogs phyag ni bcu dang bsgyings pa yis //
T02TD1853E:2b-32: padma lo ma 'jam pa brgyad phye nas //
T02TD1853E:2b-33: gnyis med bde rgyu rdo rje gzhag par mdzod //
T02TD1853E:2b-34: gsang ba'i de nyid mi nyams gsal bar 'gyur //
T02TD1853E:2b-35: rdo rje 'dab skyes zla ba'i yang dag 'du //
T02TD1853E:3a-0: thabs shes las byung chos kun de nyid mchog / rje btsun @3a * //
T02TD1853E:3a-1: bdag la phan phyir sbas pa shod //
T02TD1853E:3a-2: de nas 'jam dbyangs byang chub sems dpa' chen po yis //
T02TD1853E:3a-3: bdag la 'dzum pa'i bzhin bltas legs zhes lan gsum gsungs //
T02TD1853E:3a-4: rol pa'i gar dang chos kun de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1853E:3a-5: sgra brnyan lta bur rdo rje glu yis bdag la bstan //
T02TD1853E:3a-6: aa bi yam ram bam lam h'um aa la la ho //
T02TD1853E:3a-7: rje btsun thugs rje che rnams kyis //
T02TD1853E:3a-8: 'di rtogs pa yis bde gshegs kyi //
T02TD1853E:3a-10: 'das dang da ltar ma byon pa'i //
T02TD1853E:3a-12: gsungs shing gsung dang gsung 'gyur ba ;
T02TD1853E:3a-13: / yang dag don rab rab rtogs phyir //
T02TD1853E:3a-14: da yis khyod la bstan par bya //
T02TD1853E:3a-15: yid gcig bsdus la mnyan par gyis //
T02TD1853E:3a-16: chos rnams gzugs la sogs pa rnams //
T02TD1853E:3a-17: kun mkhyen bar gyi rang bzhin ni //
T02TD1853E:3a-18: nam mkha'i dkyil ltar rnam dag pa'i //
T02TD1853E:3a-19: zab gsal gnyis med ye shes te ;
T02TD1853E:3a-20: / de ni dngos med bsgom dngos med //
T02TD1853E:3a-21: dngos po thams cad dang bral ba'i //
T02TD1853E:3a-22: khams dang skye mched kyis ma zin //
T02TD1853E:3a-23: rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba //
T02TD1853E:3a-24: gdod nas dag pa nam mkha' bzhin //
T02TD1853E:3a-25: med nas chos rnams mtshan nyid spangs //
T02TD1853E:3a-26: chos dang chos nyid yang med de //
T02TD1853E:3a-27: dngos po med pas mkha' dang mtshungs //
T02TD1853E:3a-28: tshig dang yi ge kun las grol //
T02TD1853E:3a-29: de ni dus dang phyogs rnams dang //
T02TD1853E:3a-30: chos kun gyi ni ngo bor song //
T02TD1853E:3a-31: lus ma yin te ngag dang ni //
T02TD1853E:3a-32: yid kyang ma yin 'dod khams dang //
T02TD1853E:3a-33: gzugs dang gzugs med khams ma yin //
T02TD1853E:3a-34: 'byung chen bzhi yang ma yin te //
T02TD1853E:3a-35: de bas de ni gang na yang //
T02TD1853E:3a-36: mi gnas pas na mnyam pa nyid //
T02TD1853E:3a-38: chos rnams kun gyi chos nyid mchog / thabs kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i dngos //
T02TD1853E:3a-39: brtag pa kun las rab dben pa //
T02TD1853E:3a-40: phun sum tshogs rgyud pag dka' ba //
T02TD1853E:3a-41: phyag rgya chen por rab snang ba'i //
T02TD1853E:3a-42: zer gyis rang gzhan smin byed pa'i //
T02TD1853E:3a-43: de gnyis med pa'i rang bzhin mchog / rdo rje'i 'dzin pa chen pos kyang //
T02TD1853E:3a-44: brjod du med pa'i sku chen po //
T02TD1853E:3a-45: de nyid rgyal sras zhing bcas dang //
T02TD1853E:3a-46: srid gsum rgyu dang mi rgyur bcas //
T02TD1853E:3a-47: thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid de //
T02TD1853E:3b-0: dngos kun gtso bo @3b rang sems kyi //
T02TD1853E:3b-1: ngo bo nyid de de rtogs na //
T02TD1853E:3b-2: sangs rgyas byad chub de nyid do //
T02TD1853E:3b-3: 'jig rten gsum yang de nyid do //
T02TD1853E:3b-4: 'byung chen rnams kyang de nyid do //
T02TD1853E:3b-5: ci yi phyir na chos thams cad //
T02TD1853E:3b-6: sems la gnas te de nyid kyang //
T02TD1853E:3b-7: nam mkha' la gnas nam mkha' ni //
T02TD1853E:3b-8: gang du mi gnas 'od gsal ba //
T02TD1853E:3b-9: gzod nas rnam dag stong ba'o //
T02TD1853E:3b-10: sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das pa'i khams //
T02TD1853E:3b-11: skye med rdo rje mngon byang chub //
T02TD1853E:3b-12: bder gshegs kun gyi snying po mchog / gnyis med rtog bral don chen te //
T02TD1853E:3b-13: rim pa gnyis par rab tu bshad //
T02TD1853E:3b-14: de 'dra'i don des dngos po kun //
T02TD1853E:3b-15: rnam par khyab ste rnam gnas kyang //
T02TD1853E:3b-16: thog med dus nas de las kyang //
T02TD1853E:3b-17: rnam rtog chen po tshul byung ste //
T02TD1853E:3b-18: de las yang ni 'byung ba che //
T02TD1853E:3b-19: rlung gi dkyil 'khor nyid byung sta //
T02TD1853E:3b-20: de las kyang ni me yi khams //
T02TD1853E:3b-21: chen po byung nas khyab mdzad de //
T02TD1853E:3b-22: de las chu khams chen po yang //
T02TD1853E:3b-23: byung ste khyab mdzad de las kyang //
T02TD1853E:3b-24: sa byung bzhi bsdus ngo bo las //
T02TD1853E:3b-25: ri sogs sems can thams cad kyang //
T02TD1853E:3b-26: sna tshogs phra ba sbom po dang //
T02TD1853E:3b-27: skyes ba bud med ma ning dang //
T02TD1853E:3b-28: gzhon nu dang ni rgan po dang //
T02TD1853E:3b-29: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang //
T02TD1853E:3b-30: gdon dang skar ma gshin rje dang //
T02TD1853E:3b-31: chu bdag brgya byin dmyal ba dang //
T02TD1853E:3b-32: yi dags dud 'gro dang de kun //
T02TD1853E:3b-33: spangs dang shes tsam rab brten pa'i //
T02TD1853E:3b-34: 'gro ba kun du rgyas par gnas //
T02TD1853E:3b-35: de bas de yi gong ma yi //
T02TD1853E:3b-36: gnyis med rtog bral rab bsgrims te //
T02TD1853E:3b-37: ma rtogs pas na 'gro ba kun //
T02TD1853E:3b-39: de ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal che //
T02TD1853E:3b-40: dug chu lta bur 'khrul pa yis //
T02TD1853E:3b-41: rnam bsgrubs thag pa'i sbrul lta bur //
T02TD1853E:3b-42: snang zhing med pa nyid du 'dod //
T02TD1853E:3b-43: de bas gnyis med don chen po //
T02TD1853E:3b-44: rang rig dkyil 'khor chen po mchog / rgyun dang rnam grangs kyis gnas pas //
T02TD1853E:3b-45: de yi ngo bo rtogs par bya //
T02TD1853E:3b-46: gang zhig de rtogs rab 'dun pa //
T02TD1853E:3b-47: sems kyi smon lam yang dag can //
T02TD1853E:3b-48: sngon du bsod nams mthu bskyed dang //
T02TD1853E:3b-49: skyes bu yang dag bzhi la brten //
T02TD1853E:3b-50: spro dang kus dang bsnyen bkur dang //
T02TD1853E:3b-51: 'dun par ldan zhing sgom pa dang //
T02TD1853E:3b-52: brtan po som nyi rnam spangs pa //
T02TD1853E:3b-53: rjes mthun gtong phod des shes 'gyur//
T02TD1853E:4a-0: @4a * // de yis rje btsun yang dag pa //
T02TD1853E:4a-1: mchog gi gdams ngag rgyud la ldan //
T02TD1853E:4a-2: theg chen lam gyi spyod pa dang //
T02TD1853E:4a-3: bsgom pa la ni lhur len dang //
T02TD1853E:4a-4: de nyid bcu la sogs pa yi //
T02TD1853E:4a-5: gsang dang rab gsang shin tu gsang //
T02TD1853E:4a-6: shes shing de yi don gab bar //
T02TD1853E:4a-7: ston byed bla ma mnyes par bya //
T02TD1853E:4a-8: yul dang mkhar dang khyim dang rta //
T02TD1853E:4a-9: glang po che sogs ma la stan dang //
T02TD1853E:4a-10: chung ma sdug dang yid 'od bu //
T02TD1853E:4a-11: bu mo srid mo tsha mo sogs //
T02TD1853E:4a-12: gzhan yang gser dang dngul gyi rdzas //
T02TD1853E:4a-13: zangs lcags sogs las byas pa yis //
T02TD1853E:4a-14: mdzes pa'i rdzas dang mu tig gi //
T02TD1853E:4a-15: phreng dang padma r'a ga dang //
T02TD1853E:4a-16: pu shar aindra n'i la dang //
T02TD1853E:4a-17: margad g-yu sogs mchod pa'i tshogs //
T02TD1853E:4a-18: zhing 'di mkhas pas rab bkang ste //
T02TD1853E:4a-19: de 'dra'i rje btsun dbang po mchod //
T02TD1853E:4a-20: gsal zhing rab dga' mkha' mnyam pa //
T02TD1853E:4a-21: gzhan du rigs par mi 'gyur bas //
T02TD1853E:4a-22: bud med sgyu ma'i phyag rgya ni //
T02TD1853E:4a-23: sgyu ma kun las khyad par 'phags //
T02TD1853E:4a-25: spyan la sogs par rnam dag par //
T02TD1853E:4a-26: rigs ni rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te //
T02TD1853E:4a-27: ming dang mtshan nyid bshad par bya //
T02TD1853E:4a-28: ka ma l'i dang shadkh'i ni //
T02TD1853E:4a-29: tsi tri ni dang ha sh'i ni //
T02TD1853E:4a-30: dang po klu mo'i rigs yin te //
T02TD1853E:4a-31: gnyis pa stag dang ser ge'i rigs //
T02TD1853E:4a-32: gsum pa ri dags krishna sogs //
T02TD1853E:4a-33: bzhi pa glang po che rigs so //
T02TD1853E:4a-34: de la ka ma l'i yi ni //
T02TD1853E:4a-35: dbyibs dang mtshan nyid bstan par bya //
T02TD1853E:4a-36: bu mo padma'i dri bro zhing //
T02TD1853E:4a-37: do zlum sna rtse til 'dra ste //
T02TD1853E:4a-38: sen mo dmar zhing rgyab sgur dang //
T02TD1853E:4a-39: rkang mthil kun gyis sa la reg / ba spu 'khyil ldan sen mo can //
T02TD1853E:4a-41: gsus pa gnyer ma gsum ldan zhing //
T02TD1853E:4a-42: brang mdzes glang chen ltar 'gros dang //
T02TD1853E:4a-44: sha mdog dmar te lha mo 'di //
T02TD1853E:4a-45: m'a ma k'i yis rnam par dag / shadkh'i ni yi mtshan nyid dang //
T02TD1853E:4a-46: dbyibs ni khyod la bstan par bya //
T02TD1853E:4a-47: bu mo ba tsha'i dri bro zhing //
T02TD1853E:4a-48: skra ni ring zhing sna yang ring //
T02TD1853E:4a-50: 'o ma zho la rab tu sred //
T02TD1853E:4a-52: mdog ni dkar ser gnas pa yi //
T02TD1853E:4a-53: gos dkar mo yis rnam par dag / de bzhin tsi tri na ya ni //
T02TD1853E:4a-54: dbyibs dang mtshan nyid bshad par bya //
T02TD1853E:4b-0: bu mo sha rlon dri bro @4b zhing ;
T02TD1853E:4b-1: / lus chung brla ni shin tu mdzes //
T02TD1853E:4b-3: ngo tsha med cing khro 'dod pa //
T02TD1853E:4b-4: rtag tu 'thab mo dag la dga' //
T02TD1853E:4b-5: rje dar bya rog rkang 'dra zhing //
T02TD1853E:4b-6: mchu 'phyang gan rgyal du nyal ba //
T02TD1853E:4b-7: phug ron skad 'dra sha mdog ni //
T02TD1853E:4b-8: sngo bsangs rakta'i ro tsha ba'o //
T02TD1853E:4b-9: de ni lha mo sgrol mas dag / ha sta'i ni yi ma tshad nyid dang //
T02TD1853E:4b-10: dbyibs ni nga yis bstan par bya //
T02TD1853E:4b-11: bu mo chang gi dri bro zhing //
T02TD1853E:4b-12: byin sbom sna ni cung zad yo //
T02TD1853E:4b-13: dri nga zhing ni lus sngom dang //
T02TD1853E:4b-14: spyod pa rtsing zhing mdog rdul skya //
T02TD1853E:4b-15: dkar 'chang g-yas g-yon du dgye ba //
T02TD1853E:4b-16: sha mdog smug cing rakta'i ro //
T02TD1853E:4b-17: bsngal zhing de 'dra'i bu mo ni //
T02TD1853E:4b-18: sangs rgyas spyan mas dag ba'o //
T02TD1853E:4b-19: da ni de dag thams cad kyi //
T02TD1853E:4b-20: rung dang mi rung spyod pa bstan //
T02TD1853E:4b-21: rol tshe rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang //
T02TD1853E:4b-22: khong du dga' zhing tshig mang dang //
T02TD1853E:4b-23: bsgo ba bzhin du bka' yang gcog /'o byas kha ni 'phyi byed de //
T02TD1853E:4b-24: bla ma'i yon tan shes 'gyur yang //
T02TD1853E:4b-25: gzhan du de la cung zad bsnyad //
T02TD1853E:4b-26: bla ma ma mthong ltar byed cing //
T02TD1853E:4b-28: rje btsun de dang mi mthun pa'i //
T02TD1853E:4b-29: mi gzhan dang ni rtse dga' byed //
T02TD1853E:4b-30: de sogs rab tu mi rung ste //
T02TD1853E:4b-31: mkhas pas rab tu spang par bya //
T02TD1853E:4b-32: rung ba 'di ni mkhas pas btsal //
T02TD1853E:4b-33: mig gi rtsa ma dangs mig rtsa rgod //
T02TD1853E:4b-34: slar zhing skad cig bsam pa dang //
T02TD1853E:4b-35: skad cig rgod pa'i 'phro bzhag nas //
T02TD1853E:4b-37: rje btsun bla ma mthong gyur na //
T02TD1853E:4b-38: dga' zhing mdzes lta 'dzum par byed //
T02TD1853E:4b-39: de yi bka' stsal nyan zhing mos //
T02TD1853E:4b-40: steg pa'i tshul gyis zhe sar ldan //
T02TD1853E:4b-41: gzhan du de la snyan par brjod //
T02TD1853E:4b-43: phag tu 'khri zhing sor tshigs nyed //
T02TD1853E:4b-44: skra ni bkrol nas slar 'ching byed //
T02TD1853E:4b-46: bla ma ma mthong ltar byed cing //
T02TD1853E:4b-47: gos 'chos pa dang lus nyed dang //
T02TD1853E:4b-49: bus pa'i kha la 'o byed cing //
T02TD1853E:4b-50: nu ma ston cing ske rags 'grol //
T02TD1853E:4b-51: rje btsun de yis ma mthong na //
T02TD1853E:4b-52: glu dbyangs led cing mthong bar byed //
T02TD1853E:4b-53: de ni gang la gnas pa der //
T02TD1853E:4b-54: don med bsnyad kyis 'gro ba dang //
T02TD1853E:4b-55: drag tu gad mos rab steg ste //
T02TD1853E:4b-56: lu zhing glal ba ltar byed cing //
T02TD1853E:5a-0: @5a * // mi mo 'di yang sten par byed //
T02TD1853E:5a-1: da ni gsang gnas dbyibs kyi ni //
T02TD1853E:5a-2: mtshan nyid rung dang mi rung ba //
T02TD1853E:5a-3: da yis yang dag bstan par bya //
T02TD1853E:5a-4: yid gcig bsdus la mnyan par gyis //
T02TD1853E:5a-5: gyo mo lta bu kha sbub dang //
T02TD1853E:5a-6: khung ring shin tu mi sdug dang //
T02TD1853E:5a-7: rtag tu skam por gnas pa dang //
T02TD1853E:5a-8: rtag tu zil pa 'dzag pa dang //
T02TD1853E:5a-9: sbal pa'i rgyab ltar rtsub pa yi //
T02TD1853E:5a-10: gnas ni spang bya mi rung ngo //
T02TD1853E:5a-11: rus sbal rgyab ltar 'phang mtho zhing //
T02TD1853E:5a-12: steng mnyam shin tu 'jam po dang //
T02TD1853E:5a-13: ba glang gi ni ltag pa ltar //
T02TD1853E:5a-14: steng mnyam thog gi dbyibs kyang ring //
T02TD1853E:5a-15: padma'i snying po bzhin du zlum //
T02TD1853E:5a-17: sbu nyung sgyu ma'i phyag rgya ni //
T02TD1853E:5a-18: mkhas pas thabs kyis shin tu btsal //
T02TD1853E:5a-19: mtshan nyid de dang mi ldan yang //
T02TD1853E:5a-20: rigs dang gzugs dang lang tshor ldan //
T02TD1853E:5a-21: rgyan mdzes yid 'ong bu mo ni //
T02TD1853E:5a-22: longs spyod gsum ldan gzung bar bya //
T02TD1853E:5a-23: chos zab la mos sems dang ni //
T02TD1853E:5a-25: sngon gsungs grogs kyis shes bslus pa'i //
T02TD1853E:5a-26: mi mo yang ni mkhas pas bsgrubs //
T02TD1853E:5a-27: de ltar de sogs bud med kyi //
T02TD1853E:5a-28: sgyu ma'i phyag rgya chen pos ni //
T02TD1853E:5a-29: 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba'i //
T02TD1853E:5a-30: lhag pa'i lha zhes bya ba sgrub //
T02TD1853E:5a-31: de yang thun mong dang bcas pa //
T02TD1853E:5a-32: tshogs kyi mchod pa yang byas te //
T02TD1853E:5a-33: gang gsungs bu mo btsal nas kyang //
T02TD1853E:5a-34: bla ma la ni dbul bar bya //
T02TD1853E:5a-35: de nas bla ma de mnyes nas //
T02TD1853E:5a-36: de dang snyoms par zhugs pa yis //
T02TD1853E:5a-37: bde gshegs zhu gyur bcu drug char //
T02TD1853E:5a-38: gyur pa slob ma'i kha ru ltung //
T02TD1853E:5a-39: ltung bas snying gi padmar zhugs //
T02TD1853E:5a-40: de yis zhing ni dag byas te //
T02TD1853E:5a-41: chos kun sgyu ma la sogs pa'i //
T02TD1853E:5a-42: bcu gnyis don du rtogs par 'gyur //
T02TD1853E:5a-43: de nas de la rang 'byung gi //
T02TD1853E:5a-44: chos sku rab dga' mkha' mnyam pa //
T02TD1853E:5a-45: lhag pa'i lha zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD1853E:5a-46: rtogs bya'i ched du bu mo byin //
T02TD1853E:5a-47: lha mo 'di ni khyod dang mthun //
T02TD1853E:5a-48: sems can khyod kyis 'dod pa gyis //
T02TD1853E:5a-50: sangs rgyas kun gyis spyod du gnang //
T02TD1853E:5a-52: bu mo sgrol byed dga' byin ma //
T02TD1853E:5a-53: byang chub chen po bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02TD1853E:5b-0: khyod @5b kyis bde chen myong bar gyis //
T02TD1853E:5b-1: gzhan gyis sangs rgyas mi nus pa //
T02TD1853E:5b-2: bu mo 'di ni yang dag mchog / de bas mtha' med 'khor ba'i bar //
T02TD1853E:5b-3: khyod kyis 'di dang bral mi bya //
T02TD1853E:5b-4: de nas sems can de yis ni //
T02TD1853E:5b-5: yid 'ong bu mo blangs byas te //
T02TD1853E:5b-6: de yis dam tshig sdom pa'i mchog /
T02TD1853E:5b-7: tshig 'dis rab tu smra bar bya //
T02TD1853E:5b-8: smros shig bu khyod rdo rje can //
T02TD1853E:5b-9: sha khrag khu ba la sogs pa /
T02TD1853E:5b-10: dri chen dri chu sogs za'am //
T02TD1853E:5b-11: bha ga'o byed mi rtog gam //
T02TD1853E:5b-12: gzung mang la khyod brod dam //
T02TD1853E:5b-13: de yis bzhad gad dang ldan par //
T02TD1853E:5b-14: kye lha mo ci phyir bdag mi brod //
T02TD1853E:5b-15: dri chen dri chu sogs za'o ;
T02TD1853E:5b-16: / lha mo khyod la bkur sti dgos //
T02TD1853E:5b-17: bha ga'o byed nga mi rtog / de nas bu mos ga sha phud / pa ma gsal bstan tshig 'dis bstod //
T02TD1853E:5b-18: ae ma ho bdag gi padma 'di //
T02TD1853E:5b-19: bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa //
T02TD1853E:5b-20: cho ga'i rim pa gang gis spyad //
T02TD1853E:5b-21: de yi mdun na rtag tu gnas //
T02TD1853E:5b-23: sangs rgyas kun gyis bkur ba'i gnas //
T02TD1853E:5b-24: rang 'byung bde ba chen po ni //
T02TD1853E:5b-25: 'di na rtag par bzhugs pa yin //
T02TD1853E:5b-27: de nas rang gis bon las //
T02TD1853E:5b-28: 'od zer stug pos nang gsal nas //
T02TD1853E:5b-29: lha yi 'khor lo chags byas nas //
T02TD1853E:5b-30: rdo rje nang nas phying byung ste //
T02TD1853E:5b-31: padma'i nang du zhugs byas nas //
T02TD1853E:5b-32: rig ma'i lha yi 'khor lo rnams //
T02TD1853E:5b-33: chags pa chen po bskyed nas kyang //
T02TD1853E:5b-34: zhal nas zhal zhugs 'khor lo rnams //
T02TD1853E:5b-35: chags chen bskyed nas rdo rjer phyung //
T02TD1853E:5b-36: sngon bzhin zhugs sogs rab byas pas //
T02TD1853E:5b-37: yang nas yang du lha'i dkyil 'khor //
T02TD1853E:5b-38: yid kyis shin tu chags par bya //
T02TD1853E:5b-39: de nas 'dod pa'i sgyu ma'i tshig / brjod pas bu mo chags par bya //
T02TD1853E:5b-40: gnyis su med pa bde ba chen po mchog / lha mo khyod ni sgyu ma'i phyag rgya ste //
T02TD1853E:5b-41: zhal bzang khyod ni nga dang lhan cig tu //
T02TD1853E:5b-42: rnam par brtson pas mkha' 'dra myang bar bya //
T02TD1853E:5b-43: des kyang sgyu ma lta bu yi //
T02TD1853E:5b-44: 'dod pa'i tshig gis gsol btab nas //
T02TD1853E:5b-45: bdag nyid chags pa chen po yang //
T02TD1853E:5b-46: bskyed nas rtsa yi 'khor lo btsal //
T02TD1853E:5b-47: bde mchog rgya chen bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02TD1853E:5b-48: bsam mi khyab ba'i bde chen dag dang ldan //
T02TD1853E:6a-1: tshig dang bral ba'i dbyangs snyan pas //
T02TD1853E:6a-2: bdag la khyod kyis rol cig bzhengs su gsol //
T02TD1853E:6a-3: ngo mtshar che ba'i rol pas snang mdzad cing //
T02TD1853E:6a-4: byang chub snying por 'gro ba'i la ma mchog 'di //
T02TD1853E:6a-5: rgyud rnams yang dag gang la mi rten pas //
T02TD1853E:6a-6: bde chen yid 'ong nga yis grol bar gyis //
T02TD1853E:6a-8: rol cig rol cig bdag la rol //
T02TD1853E:6a-9: 'dod pa gyis shig dga' gsol ba /
T02TD1853E:6a-10: khyod kyis gzhan du mi rtogs pa //
T02TD1853E:6a-11: rtogs pas the tshom ma byed cig / aa la la ho //
T02TD1853E:6a-12: de nas rab tu chags ldan pas //
T02TD1853E:6a-13: de dang lhan cig lus kyi ni //
T02TD1853E:6a-14: spyod pas dben pa'i gnas su spyad //
T02TD1853E:6a-15: rol pas dga' ba brtag par bya //
T02TD1853E:6a-16: dang por 'dus pa byas nas su //
T02TD1853E:6a-17: de nas gru mo mtshan nyid dang //
T02TD1853E:6a-18: yang ni brkyang par bya ba dang //
T02TD1853E:6a-19: de bzhin yar bteg mtshan nyid dang //
T02TD1853E:6a-20: shin tu brkyang pas lnga ru 'gyur //
T02TD1853E:6a-21: dpung pa rab tu brkyang byas nas /
T02TD1853E:6a-22: gru mo mdud pas mgul nas 'khyud //
T02TD1853E:6a-23: bcing bas dam 'khyud g-yas g-yon skra //
T02TD1853E:6a-24: mgo ni mi g-yo bzung nas blta //
T02TD1853E:6a-25: de nas padma gnyis bar bltas te //
T02TD1853E:6a-26: bung ba lta bu zid sgra'i glu //
T02TD1853E:6a-27: blangs nas mchu yis rtse bar bya //
T02TD1853E:6a-29: g-yon gyis spyi bo'i skra bzung ste //
T02TD1853E:6a-30: g-yas kyis lkog ma brten nas kyang //
T02TD1853E:6a-31: ma mchu'i sbrang rtsi gzhib par bya //
T02TD1853E:6a-32: gzhib cing zid sgra brjod nas kyang //
T02TD1853E:6a-33: nu ma lag rtsa mgrin pa dang //
T02TD1853E:6a-34: ma mchu 'gram pa rna ba'i rtsa //
T02TD1853E:6a-35: mig dang spyi bo gsang bar yang //
T02TD1853E:6a-36: kha yis 'o byas rtse bar bya //
T02TD1853E:6a-37: rna ba gnyis dang mchan khung dang //
T02TD1853E:6a-38: mgrin pa gnyis dang sum mdo rnams //
T02TD1853E:6a-39: sen mo re mos gdab par bya //
T02TD1853E:6a-40: nu ma gnyis dang mchan khud gnyis //
T02TD1853E:6a-41: gtso gnyis dang ni 'gram pa gnyis //
T02TD1853E:6a-42: lag mthil gnyis dang rkang mthil gnyis //
T02TD1853E:6a-43: mnyes pas mdza' ba chen po 'grub //
T02TD1853E:6a-45: ma nye zhing lce yis bskyod par bya //
T02TD1853E:6a-46: steng 'og tu yang blta byas nas //
T02TD1853E:6a-47: sems kyis de la chags par bya //
T02TD1853E:6a-48: de nas dga' ba'i bu mo des //
T02TD1853E:6a-50: rang byung bde chen rgyal po ni //
T02TD1853E:6b-0: rtsa dang rlung @6b gis rtogs 'gyur bas //
T02TD1853E:6b-1: khyod kyi rtsa yi 'khor lo tshol //
T02TD1853E:6b-2: de nas de yi sor mo yis //
T02TD1853E:6b-3: nang nas rtsa yi 'khor lo che //
T02TD1853E:6b-4: padma la gnas snying po lngas //
T02TD1853E:6b-5: rgyan byas ze'u 'bru ge sar dang //
T02TD1853E:6b-6: 'dab ma brgyad pa gsal byas nas //
T02TD1853E:6b-7: a'a li k'a li mantra dang //
T02TD1853E:6b-8: kur ma ka dang sha sha ka / n'a li gsum po btsal bar bya //
T02TD1853E:6b-9: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug rtsa //
T02TD1853E:6b-10: gzung 'dzin bral ba bha ga'i dbus //
T02TD1853E:6b-11: bla ma'i man ngag stobs kyis ni //
T02TD1853E:6b-12: sor mos go bar bya dgos so //
T02TD1853E:6b-13: de nas sa bcu dang ldan pa'i //
T02TD1853E:6b-14: lha mo de la 'khyud par bya //
T02TD1853E:6b-15: rdo rje padmar reg pa ni //
T02TD1853E:6b-16: bsnyen pa'i de nyid yin par bshad //
T02TD1853E:6b-17: rdo rje padmar zhugs pa ni //
T02TD1853E:6b-18: nye bar sgrub pa'i de nyid do //
T02TD1853E:6b-19: de nas bsgul zhing bskyod tsam gyis //
T02TD1853E:6b-20: snying ni 'dar zhing dran pa nyams //
T02TD1853E:6b-21: spyi bo'i skra grol gos kyang 'dor //
T02TD1853E:6b-22: rdul gyis lus khyab mdog dmar te //
T02TD1853E:6b-23: mig dmar phra bas bdag la blta //
T02TD1853E:6b-24: yang du bskul bas bsgrub pa'o //
T02TD1853E:6b-25: de bas sems khral med pa ru //
T02TD1853E:6b-26: sdom brtson gzhu dbyibs g-yo ba yis //
T02TD1853E:6b-27: sum mdo ye shes me sbar nas //
T02TD1853E:6b-28: khams bzhus nas ni bcu drug char //
T02TD1853E:6b-30: rlung gi sbyor bas phul bar bya //
T02TD1853E:6b-31: rang bzhin gyis ni rab zhi ba //
T02TD1853E:6b-32: chos kun zhi ba de kho na ;
T02TD1853E:6b-33: / bde ba de nyid nor bur 'dug / skad cig dran med g-yo bar byed //
T02TD1853E:6b-34: sgrub pa chen po de nyid do //
T02TD1853E:6b-35: nam mkha'i khams dang rdo rje sbyor ba las ni yang dag spyan can bde chen 'byung bar 'gyur //
T02TD1853E:6b-36: gang gang yang dag dga' byed chags bral dga' gnyis bar du bden gnyis mthong byas brtan par gyis //
T02TD1853E:6b-37: padma'i mkha' la rdo rje nor bu pad snying gnyis la 'byor dang rdo rje skyil krung sems //
T02TD1853E:6b-38: nor bu'i bar du mthong byas gang de bde ba 'byung ba nges par de nyid ye shes te //
T02TD1853E:6b-39: 'di ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa yin par bla ma mchog rnams kun gyis yang dag bshad //
T02TD1853E:6b-40: 'dod chags chags bral bar ma ma dmigs ye shes lha ni skad cig de ru bsam //
T02TD1853E:6b-41: chu chod brgyad dam nyin gcig dang ni zla ba gcig tu'am //
T02TD1853E:6b-42: lo gcig bskal ba'am bskal pa stong du ye shes de myong bya //
T02TD1853E:6b-43: padma la gnas bdud rtsi khu ba blo gros can gyis kha yis blangs nas btung bya'o //
T02TD1853E:7a-2: mtha' yi de nyid zab gsal ba //
T02TD1853E:7a-3: thog med dus nas so so yi //
T02TD1853E:7a-4: skye bo nga dang ngar 'dzin pas //
T02TD1853E:7a-5: ma brtags par ni bdag tu bzung //
T02TD1853E:7a-6: dus las byung dang 'dod rgyal dang //
T02TD1853E:7a-7: gnam gyis bskos dang gyin dang //
T02TD1853E:7a-8: 'dzin pa pos ni sprul pa dang//
T02TD1853E:7a-9: khams kun las ni nges 'byung dang //
T02TD1853E:7a-11: dus dang gtso bo byed pa dang //
T02TD1853E:7a-12: byed pa po ni ma yin dang //
T02TD1853E:7a-13: rnal 'byor dang ni tshad ma dang //
T02TD1853E:7a-14: dag pa dang ni ma dag pa //
T02TD1853E:7a-15: nang nas brjod du med pa'i bdag / skyes bu dang ni khyab bdag dang //
T02TD1853E:7a-16: srog dang gang zag rnam shes dang //
T02TD1853E:7a-17: kun gzhi dang ni shes pa po //
T02TD1853E:7a-18: mthong ba po dang gzung 'dzin dang //
T02TD1853E:7a-19: shes pa dang ni shes bya dang //
T02TD1853E:7a-20: shed las skyes dang shed bu dang //
T02TD1853E:7a-21: srog dang gso ba la sogs pa //
T02TD1853E:7a-22: mu stegs rnams kyis rnam par rtogs //
T02TD1853E:7a-23: nam mkha' dang ni 'gog pa gnyis //
T02TD1853E:7a-24: shin tu 'dus ma byas pa ste //
T02TD1853E:7a-25: shin tu brtan byas 'dus byas kun //
T02TD1853E:7a-26: skad cig ma ste bdag po med //
T02TD1853E:7a-27: phra rab rdul las grub pa ni //
T02TD1853E:7a-28: blo yi rnam pa med pa ru //
T02TD1853E:7a-29: kha che bye brag smra bas rtogs //
T02TD1853E:7a-30: rang gi rig pa skyed byed pa //
T02TD1853E:7a-31: blta bya spyod yul rnam par ni //
T02TD1853E:7a-32: 'dus ma byas pa gsum po dang //
T02TD1853E:7a-33: mo gsham bu bzhin med pa dang //
T02TD1853E:7a-34: 'du byed thams cad bems rig dang //
T02TD1853E:7a-35: dus gsum rgyu ba ma yin dang //
T02TD1853E:7a-36: dman min thogs med gzugs su ni //
T02TD1853E:7a-37: mdo sde pa yis rab tu rtogs //
T02TD1853E:7a-38: yan lag can yang don dam min //
T02TD1853E:7a-39: rdul phran dag kyang de bzhin no//
T02TD1853E:7a-40: so sor snang ba mi dmigs pa //
T02TD1853E:7a-41: rmi lam lta bur mi snang ste //
T02TD1853E:7a-42: gzung 'dzin spangs pa'i ye shes te //
T02TD1853E:7a-43: don dam shel ltar dag pa ru //
T02TD1853E:7a-44: rnal 'byor spyod pas rab tu rtogs //
T02TD1853E:7a-45: so sor snang ba'i gzhung thams cad //
T02TD1853E:7a-46: don dam min te gcig pa dang //
T02TD1853E:7a-47: du ma'i rang bzhin bral ba'i phyir ;
T02TD1853E:7a-48: / nam mkha'i chu skyes bzhin du ni //
T02TD1853E:7a-49: gnyis med gnyis su med min zhi //
T02TD1853E:7a-50: shin tu dri med nam mkha' ltar //
T02TD1853E:7a-51: blo ldan dbu ma pa yis rtogs //
T02TD1853E:7a-52: de la rtogs te mtha' yas pa //
T02TD1853E:7a-53: don de khon la gnas nas //
T02TD1853E:7a-54: tha dad so sor rtogs pa'o //
T02TD1853E:7a-55: de bas de dag thams cad kyang //
T02TD1853E:7b-0: @7b yang dag min pas bla dang bcas //
T02TD1853E:7b-2: gong ma gong ma'i khyad par 'phags //
T02TD1853E:7b-3: 'og ma'i blo ni gong ma yi //
T02TD1853E:7b-4: shes rab kyis ni sun 'byin no //
T02TD1853E:7b-5: de bas gong ma'i rim pa yis //
T02TD1853E:7b-6: lhan cig pa yi slob dpon gyis //
T02TD1853E:7b-7: byin gyis brlabs pa yang dag bya //
T02TD1853E:7b-8: gsal zhing rab dga' nam mkha' 'dra //
T02TD1853E:7b-9: rang byung lhag pa'i lha chen po //
T02TD1853E:7b-10: lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyis //
T02TD1853E:7b-11: bla ma'i kha las rtogs par bya //
T02TD1853E:7b-12: de ltar dam tshig sdom ldan pa'i //
T02TD1853E:7b-13: snod du rtse gcig chu 'dra las //
T02TD1853E:7b-14: ye shes gzugs brnyan lta bu ru //
T02TD1853E:7b-15: rnal 'byor pa yis rab tu brtag / de thob phyin chad rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1853E:7b-16: 'khor ba nyid na gnas pa'i tshe //
T02TD1853E:7b-17: de yi nyes pas mi gos so //
T02TD1853E:7b-18: ji ltar sngags dang sman ldan pas //
T02TD1853E:7b-19: sbrul dag gsod par byed pa bzhin //
T02TD1853E:7b-21: ye shes sman gyis rgyas btab pas //
T02TD1853E:7b-22: nyon mongs kyis ni ci byar yod //
T02TD1853E:7b-23: gang zhig lag na gdugs thogs la //
T02TD1853E:7b-24: de la char pas ci byar yod //
T02TD1853E:7b-25: de bzhin gnyis med ye shes kyi //
T02TD1853E:7b-26: gdugs thogs la ni rtog pa yi //
T02TD1853E:7b-27: char pa rab tu 'bab gyur yang //
T02TD1853E:7b-28: de la de yis ji ltar gnod //
T02TD1853E:7b-29: de 'dra'i rab mchog ye shes ni //
T02TD1853E:7b-30: so so skye bos ga la shes //
T02TD1853E:7b-31: nyan thos rnams kyis mi shes so //
T02TD1853E:7b-32: rang sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi shes //
T02TD1853E:7b-33: rnal 'byor spyod dang dbu ma pa //
T02TD1853E:7b-34: byang chub sems dpas mi shes so //
T02TD1853E:7b-35: bla bcas sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang //
T02TD1853E:7b-36: 'di ni cung zad mi shes so //
T02TD1853E:7b-38: rdo rje 'dzin pa mnyes byas nas //
T02TD1853E:7b-39: rang gi bsod nams chen stobs kyis //
T02TD1853E:7b-40: yi ge med par rnam par 'pho //
T02TD1853E:7b-41: de la dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg dang //
T02TD1853E:7b-42: gtor ma bzlas pa bgrang phreng dang //
T02TD1853E:7b-43: skyil mo krung dang stang stabs sogs //
T02TD1853E:7b-44: spros bral rnam par slu ba ste //
T02TD1853E:7b-45: bya ba ma yin dgag pa min //
T02TD1853E:7b-46: lhag pa'i lha yis sprul phyir ro //
T02TD1853E:7b-47: bya ba rnams la rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1853E:7b-48: lam chen dag tu yongs 'dzin pa //
T02TD1853E:7b-49: ri dags smig rgyu snyeg pa ltar //
T02TD1853E:7b-50: rtag tu snang yang ma zin no //
T02TD1853E:7b-51: bya ba'i nad chen gyis zin la //
T02TD1853E:7b-52: ye shes g-yo med sman chen gyis //
T02TD1853E:7b-53: gso byed skyes bu dam pa'o //
T02TD1853E:7b-54: de bas lus ngag yid gsum gyi//
T02TD1853E:8a-0: @8a * // sdom pa mchog la gnas byas nas //
T02TD1853E:8a-1: nga'i snyam pa'i gzi bskyed la //
T02TD1853E:8a-2: rim pa gnyis pa de nyid bsgrub //
T02TD1853E:8a-3: dgon pa'am yang na grong gi mthar //
T02TD1853E:8a-4: gang rung ci rung de lta bur //
T02TD1853E:8a-5: bya bar 'os pa'i las kun yang //
T02TD1853E:8a-6: byas nas bde ba'i stan la 'dug / de nas sems can thams cad kun //
T02TD1853E:8a-7: tshangs spyod chen po bzhis dmigs te //
T02TD1853E:8a-8: de la sogs pa rang rgyud kyi //
T02TD1853E:8a-9: las kyi sgrib pa dag byas nas //
T02TD1853E:8a-10: sems tsam la ni blta byas te //
T02TD1853E:8a-11: phyi rol rang bzhin stong par bya //
T02TD1853E:8a-12: sems tsam de yang stong byas nas //
T02TD1853E:8a-13: rang rig tsam du gnas par bya //
T02TD1853E:8a-14: rang rig de yang zla ba sogs //
T02TD1853E:8a-15: gdan du brtags nas yi ge'o //
T02TD1853E:8a-16: smyu gus bsnun byas mtshan mar gyur //
T02TD1853E:8a-17: de las rang nyid lhar bskyed la //
T02TD1853E:8a-18: lha yi nga rgyal dang ldan par //
T02TD1853E:8a-19: phyag rgya bzhis ni rgyas btab ste //
T02TD1853E:8a-21: de mnyes de la goms bslabs pas //
T02TD1853E:8a-22: phyi rol lus ni ldog byed de //
T02TD1853E:8a-23: sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul mchog //
T02TD1853E:8a-24: mtha' yi de nyid bsgom par bya //
T02TD1853E:8a-25: rang snying dam tshig phyag rgya yis //
T02TD1853E:8a-26: thugs kar mtshan ma la gnas pa //
T02TD1853E:8a-27: de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes mchog / rim pa dang po pa rnams la //
T02TD1853E:8a-28: yi ge gzugs su rab snang ba ;
T02TD1853E:8a-29: / gzhom du med pa rang lha yi //
T02TD1853E:8a-31: de yi kha dog rnam lnga yis //
T02TD1853E:8a-32: 'od zer steng gi sgo yi ni //
T02TD1853E:8a-33: g-yas nas rnam par spro bar bya //
T02TD1853E:8a-35: 'khor lo ldan pa'i bde gshegs rnams //
T02TD1853E:8a-36: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bkang byas nas ;
T02TD1853E:8a-37: / dbugs kyi kun rtog las byung ba'i //
T02TD1853E:8a-38: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas sku //
T02TD1853E:8a-39: bskyed nas zla bar zhu byas te //
T02TD1853E:8a-40: thim nas rnam par dag byas nas //
T02TD1853E:8a-41: de rnams ye shes ngo bo du //
T02TD1853E:8a-42: g-yon pa'i ha sar zhugs par bya //
T02TD1853E:8a-43: de yi mtshan ma dbus gnas pa //
T02TD1853E:8a-44: sa bon la ni gzhug byas par //
T02TD1853E:8a-45: de nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1853E:8a-46: yon tan kun bskyed rin po che //
T02TD1853E:8a-47: dngos po kun la khyab pa'i bdag / mi shigs pa yi thig le che //
T02TD1853E:8a-48: 'od zer lnga dang rab ldan pa //
T02TD1853E:8a-49: tsa na ka yi 'bru tsam du //
T02TD1853E:8a-50: rang gi sems su chos thams cad //
T02TD1853E:8b-0: bsdus nas rnam par bsam @8b par bya //
T02TD1853E:8b-1: de yi 'od zer rim pa yis //
T02TD1853E:8b-2: rang gi gnas ni khyab par bya //
T02TD1853E:8b-3: de las phyir byung dam tshig rgya //
T02TD1853E:8b-4: nang gsal de yis phyi yi lus //
T02TD1853E:8b-5: gsal byas dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas //
T02TD1853E:8b-6: de yi gnas kyang gsal bar bya //
T02TD1853E:8b-7: de las phyir byung bdag nyid nang //
T02TD1853E:8b-8: byang chub sems gzugs bcu drug po //
T02TD1853E:8b-9: mthe bo'i rtsa bar yi ge aa //
T02TD1853E:8b-10: rje ngar gnyis la de bzhin a'a //
T02TD1853E:8b-11: brla gnyis la ni ai yi gzugs //
T02TD1853E:8b-12: gsang ba la ni a'i yi gzugs //
T02TD1853E:8b-13: lte ba'i rtsa ru au gzugs gnas //
T02TD1853E:8b-14: de bzhin gsus par a'u yi gzugs //
T02TD1853E:8b-15: nu ma gnyis su ri gzugs gnas//
T02TD1853E:8b-16: de bzhin lag par r'i gzugs te //
T02TD1853E:8b-17: mgrin pa la ni li yi gzugs //
T02TD1853E:8b-18: de bzhin ma mchur yi ge l'i //
T02TD1853E:8b-19: 'gam pa gnyis su ae gzugs so //
T02TD1853E:8b-20: de yi mig gnyis yang ni aee //
T02TD1853E:8b-21: rna ba'i rtsa bar ao yi gzugs //
T02TD1853E:8b-22: spyi bor aoo gzugs yang dag gnas //
T02TD1853E:8b-23: aam aa: 'i gzugs su tshigs kun la //
T02TD1853E:8b-24: bcu drug dus su rdzogs 'gyur ba //
T02TD1853E:8b-25: gong ma'i 'od kyis rnam bkug ste //
T02TD1853E:8b-26: thig le ru ni gzhug par bya //
T02TD1853E:8b-27: de ru sems ni cung zad tsam //
T02TD1853E:8b-28: gzung bas lha yi 'khor lo che //
T02TD1853E:8b-29: rten dang bcas pa mos pas bsgom //
T02TD1853E:8b-30: de dbus bdag po thugs ka ru //
T02TD1853E:8b-31: gong ma'i rim pas mi shigs pa'i //
T02TD1853E:8b-32: thig le chen po bsgom byas nas //
T02TD1853E:8b-33: yungs kar tshad tsam de las spro //
T02TD1853E:8b-34: rang gi gnas dang phyag rgya yi //
T02TD1853E:8b-35: nang gsal dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas //
T02TD1853E:8b-36: de yi gnas dang bdag po yi //
T02TD1853E:8b-37: nang gsal phyi lus gsal byas nas //
T02TD1853E:8b-38: dkyil 'khor rten bcas gsal bar bya //
T02TD1853E:8b-39: de nas bcu drug gnas pa yi //
T02TD1853E:8b-40: 'od zer gzhag pa phyung byas te //
T02TD1853E:8b-41: phyi yi lus ni gsal bar bya //
T02TD1853E:8b-43: rten dang bcas pa gsal byas nas //
T02TD1853E:8b-44: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bzhugs pa yi //
T02TD1853E:8b-45: bde gshegs kun gyi spyan sngar gshegs //
T02TD1853E:8b-46: bdud rtsi zhu nas zhal zhugs te //
T02TD1853E:8b-47: thig ler bdud rtsi blangs byas nas //
T02TD1853E:8b-48: rdo rje'i lam du byung nas su //
T02TD1853E:8b-50: thabs kyi ye shes g-yas zhugs te //
T02TD1853E:8b-51: de bzhin gzhan ni g-yon du zhugs //
T02TD1853E:8b-52: de nas ye shes thig le la //
T02TD1853E:9a-2: de ni 'dzag pa'i ngang tshul can //
T02TD1853E:9a-4: cung zad dmar ba'i nang du sems //
T02TD1853E:9a-5: mi g-yo zhing ni gzung bar bya //
T02TD1853E:9a-6: de la gong ma'i rim pa ltar //
T02TD1853E:9a-7: spro ba dang ni bsdu ba dang //
T02TD1853E:9a-8: gzung ba yang dag byas gyur pas //
T02TD1853E:9a-9: 'gog pa'i rdo rje sems nyid du //
T02TD1853E:9a-10: nam zhig de la reg gyur pas //
T02TD1853E:9a-11: sangs rgyas kun gyis mchog 'dzin pa //
T02TD1853E:9a-12: yid bzhin dpal dang 'dra ba yi //
T02TD1853E:9a-13: rtags rnams yang dag skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1853E:9a-14: phung po khams dang skye mched kyi //
T02TD1853E:9a-15: lha rnams ye shes me yis su //
T02TD1853E:9a-16: thog mar snying gar sdud byed pa'i //
T02TD1853E:9a-18: de la bsgrub pas byin brlabs pas //
T02TD1853E:9a-19: sna yi rtse mor 'gro bas na //
T02TD1853E:9a-20: mi shigs thig le'i rjes thogs la //
T02TD1853E:9a-21: gsang ba'i thig le bsgom par bshad //
T02TD1853E:9a-22: gong ma'i ye shes thig le las //
T02TD1853E:9a-24: phyogs bcur spros pas bde gshegs rnams //
T02TD1853E:9a-26: bkug nas ye shes ngo bo ru //
T02TD1853E:9a-27: rang gi snying gar rab tu btsud //
T02TD1853E:9a-28: de rnams zhu nas thig le la //
T02TD1853E:9a-29: zhugs pas rdul dang mun pa dang //
T02TD1853E:9a-30: snying stobs tshul du thig le yang //
T02TD1853E:9a-31: snying gi padma la babs nas //
T02TD1853E:9a-32: rang gi rdo rje nor bu yi //
T02TD1853E:9a-33: dkyil du rnam par gnas pa las //
T02TD1853E:9a-34: 'byung ba lnga yi gzugs can mchog / ye shes lnga yi ngo bo nyid //
T02TD1853E:9a-36: mtshan ma phra mo rnam bsams nas //
T02TD1853E:9a-37: de yi bum par rten gyi tshad //
T02TD1853E:9a-38: yungs kar tsam dbus 'khor lo che//
T02TD1853E:9a-39: thig ler bcas pa mos par bsgom //
T02TD1853E:9a-40: gal te de la rang gi sems //
T02TD1853E:9a-41: bying bar song ngam skyo ba na //
T02TD1853E:9a-42: rdo rje las ni phyir byung ste //
T02TD1853E:9a-43: sna rtser rnam par gnas byas nas //
T02TD1853E:9a-44: dga' bral dga' bas brtag par bya //
T02TD1853E:9a-46: gong gi rim pas 'od zer lnga //
T02TD1853E:9a-47: steng gi sgo las byung ba dang //
T02TD1853E:9a-48: slar yang bdud rtsi 'gugs pa dang //
T02TD1853E:9a-49: de bzhin gzhi la gzhug pa dang //
T02TD1853E:9a-50: dbugs dgag stong pa'i yan lag go //
T02TD1853E:9a-51: de nas gsang ba'i thig le che //
T02TD1853E:9a-52: rab tu phra ba gong ma bzhin //
T02TD1853E:9a-53: rang sems dal bu dal bus gzung //
T02TD1853E:9b-0: dngos po med pa'i gnas su @9b 'gyur //
T02TD1853E:9b-1: de yang bzung ba goms pa yis //
T02TD1853E:9b-2: phyin ci log ni rnam par ldog / smig rgyu lta bu snang ba ni //
T02TD1853E:9b-3: rtags ni dang por shes par bya //
T02TD1853E:9b-4: de bzhin du ni chu log pas //
T02TD1853E:9b-6: gnyis pa yin par shes par bya //
T02TD1853E:9b-7: me ni rnam par log gyur pas //
T02TD1853E:9b-9: rlung ni de bzhin log pas na //
T02TD1853E:9b-10: mar me lta bur ba snang bas //
T02TD1853E:9b-11: rtags ni bzhi par shes par bya //
T02TD1853E:9b-12: de bzhin phyin log rnam par shes //
T02TD1853E:9b-13: log pas zab gsal gnyis med kyi //
T02TD1853E:9b-14: don dran sprin med nam mkha' ltar //
T02TD1853E:9b-16: mtshan ma lnga po de yis ni //
T02TD1853E:9b-17: mi gnas mya ngan 'das thob pas //
T02TD1853E:9b-19: gzung ba yi ni yan lag go //
T02TD1853E:9b-20: de ltar de la mtshan ma lnga //
T02TD1853E:9b-21: mthong byas don des khyab bya'i phyir //
T02TD1853E:9b-22: rdo rje yi ni lam nas su //
T02TD1853E:9b-23: nam mkha'i khams su spro bar bya //
T02TD1853E:9b-24: spros pa de las mngon mthong ba'i //
T02TD1853E:9b-25: so sor snang ba bskyed par bya //
T02TD1853E:9b-26: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang //
T02TD1853E:9b-27: chos ni yang dag rjes dran dang //
T02TD1853E:9b-28: rdo rje rjes su dran pa dang //
T02TD1853E:9b-29: rigs ni yang dag rjes dran dang //
T02TD1853E:9b-30: khro bo rjes su dran pa ni //
T02TD1853E:9b-31: snang mdzad dang ni tshe dpag med //
T02TD1853E:9b-32: mi bskyod rin chen 'byung ldan sogs //
T02TD1853E:9b-33: gshin rje gshed sogs khro bo yi //
T02TD1853E:9b-34: dkyil 'khor sku sogs ji snyed po //
T02TD1853E:9b-35: spro bsdu las ni gsal bar bya //
T02TD1853E:9b-36: de bzhin dam tshig rjes dran ni //
T02TD1853E:9b-37: rjes su chags dang cho ga bzhi //
T02TD1853E:9b-38: dang po spro bsdu las gsal bya //
T02TD1853E:9b-39: dkyil 'khor rjes su dran pa ni //
T02TD1853E:9b-40: cho ga gnyis pa la sogs pa'i //
T02TD1853E:9b-41: dkyil 'khor spro bsdu las gsal bya //
T02TD1853E:9b-42: sku ni rjes su dran pa dang //
T02TD1853E:9b-43: gsung dang thugs ni rjes dran dang //
T02TD1853E:9b-44: sems can rjes su dran pa ni //
T02TD1853E:9b-45: sku dang gsung thugs bsgoms pa yi //
T02TD1853E:9b-46: rdo rje gsum ni spro bsdu las //
T02TD1853E:9b-47: rnam par smin cing dran pa'o //
T02TD1853E:9b-48: de bzhin sngags ni thams cad kyi //
T02TD1853E:9b-49: spyi gzugs rjes su dran pa ni //
T02TD1853E:9b-50: ye shes lnga yis rdo rje sems //
T02TD1853E:9b-51: bskyed pa dang ni rang gi lha //
T02TD1853E:9b-52: longs spyod bzhi ldan spro bsdu las //
T02TD1853E:9b-53: rjes su gsal ba rnyed pa'o //
T02TD1853E:9b-54: dam tshig rjes su dran pa ni //
T02TD1853E:9b-55: bdud rtsi myang ba la sogs pa //
T02TD1853E:10a-2: shes rab pha rol phyin pa dang //
T02TD1853E:10a-3: ma skyes rjes su dran pa ni //
T02TD1853E:10a-4: spros pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag kyang //
T02TD1853E:10a-5: ci yang yod pa ma yin te //
T02TD1853E:10a-6: de ni gnyis med ngo bo ru //
T02TD1853E:10a-7: spro bsdu las ni dran pa'o //
T02TD1853E:10a-8: zhe sdang rigs la sogs pa yi //
T02TD1853E:10a-9: mchod pa rjes dran sbyor ba ni //
T02TD1853E:10a-10: rang gi rigs kyi bu mo mchog / bar ma'i longs spyod bzhi dag pa //
T02TD1853E:10a-11: rjes su chags pas mnyes bya ba //
T02TD1853E:10a-12: spro bsdu las ni gsal byed pa'o //
T02TD1853E:10a-13: rjes su dran pa'i yan lag go //
T02TD1853E:10a-14: de ltar yan lag gsum gyis ni //
T02TD1853E:10a-15: gsang ba'i theg le bsgom byas nas //
T02TD1853E:10a-16: nor du las ni byung nas kyang //
T02TD1853E:10a-17: khams gsum khyab par byed pas ni //
T02TD1853E:10a-18: sprul pa'i thig le bsgom par bshad //
T02TD1853E:10a-19: rang gi spyi bo'i dbus su ni //
T02TD1853E:10a-20: sku yi rdo rje'i thugs ka ru //
T02TD1853E:10a-21: mtshan ma la gnas rlung dkyil 'khor //
T02TD1853E:10a-22: dud ka 'dra bar zla ba la //
T02TD1853E:10a-23: aom dkar 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid bsam //
T02TD1853E:10a-24: de bzhin mgrin pa'i dbus su yang //
T02TD1853E:10a-25: gsung gi rdo rje thugs ka yi //
T02TD1853E:10a-26: mtshan pa'i dbus su chu dkyil 'khor //
T02TD1853E:10a-27: dkar po dbus su chu dkyil 'khor //
T02TD1853E:10a-28: dkar po dbus su zla ba la /
T02TD1853E:10a-29: a'a: dmar gnas pa'i rang bzhin bsgom //
T02TD1853E:10a-30: thugs kar thugs kyi rdo rje yi //
T02TD1853E:10a-31: thugs kar mtshan ma la gnas pa'i //
T02TD1853E:10a-32: me yi dkyil 'khor dmar po la //
T02TD1853E:10a-33: zla gnas dbus su h'um nag po //
T02TD1853E:10a-34: 'gro ba'i rang bzhin bsams nas kyang //
T02TD1853E:10a-35: nu ma gnyis kyi bar du yang //
T02TD1853E:10a-36: dam tshig phyag rgya'i thugs ka ru //
T02TD1853E:10a-37: mtshan ma la gnas dbang chen ni //
T02TD1853E:10a-38: dkyil 'khor ser po zla ba la //
T02TD1853E:10a-39: rang gi lha yi sa bon che //
T02TD1853E:10a-41: rnam par grol ba'i sa bon bsam //
T02TD1853E:10a-42: de ltar phyag rgya bzhi chen dang //
T02TD1853E:10a-43: bdag nyid 'brel bar byas nas su //
T02TD1853E:10a-44: rim pa 'di yis mi shigs pa'i //
T02TD1853E:10a-45: rdo rje bzlas pa'i ngo bo bya //
T02TD1853E:10a-46: g-yas pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams //
T02TD1853E:10a-47: rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po ste //
T02TD1853E:10a-48: kha dog dud ka rgyu ba las //
T02TD1853E:10a-49: 'byung ba h'um gi ngo bo yis //
T02TD1853E:10a-50: snang srid chos kun khyab byas nas //
T02TD1853E:10a-51: chos kun dag byas bdud rtsir gyur //
T02TD1853E:10a-52: aom gyi ngo bos 'ong byas nas //
T02TD1853E:10a-53: rang gi rgyud kyi bag chags ni //
T02TD1853E:10a-54: bkrus nas dag byas de la zhugs //
T02TD1853E:10b-0: a'a: yi ngo @10b bos dag byas nas //
T02TD1853E:10b-1: de la lha yi de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1853E:10b-2: gzung ba da la bus dbu lus byas //
T02TD1853E:10b-3: dngos po med pa'i gnas su 'gyur //
T02TD1853E:10b-4: g-yon pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams //
T02TD1853E:10b-5: chu yi dkyil 'khor chen po ste //
T02TD1853E:10b-6: kha dog dkar po rab gnas pa //
T02TD1853E:10b-7: de las byung ba'i h'um dang ni //
T02TD1853E:10b-8: aom gyi rang bzhin 'du ba dang //
T02TD1853E:10b-9: a'a: yi rang bzhin gnas pa dang //
T02TD1853E:10b-10: de nyid bzung bas snga ma bzhin //
T02TD1853E:10b-11: gnyi ga las ni drag tu 'byung //
T02TD1853E:10b-12: me yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te //
T02TD1853E:10b-13: kha dog dmar po'i ngo bo las //
T02TD1853E:10b-14: h'um gis spros dang aom gyis bsdus //
T02TD1853E:10b-15: a'a: yis gnas pa de nyid gzung //
T02TD1853E:10b-16: snga ma bzhin du shes par bya //
T02TD1853E:10b-17: de bzhin gnyis las dal bu 'byung //
T02TD1853E:10b-18: dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor gyu //
T02TD1853E:10b-19: kha dog gser ltar rab snang ba //
T02TD1853E:10b-20: de la h'um gis 'byung ba dang //
T02TD1853E:10b-21: aom gyis sdud dang a'a: yis gnas //
T02TD1853E:10b-22: de la de nyid rab bzung pas //
T02TD1853E:10b-23: 'jug dang gnas dang ldang ba las //
T02TD1853E:10b-24: grol ba'i ye shes rnyed 'gyur ba //
T02TD1853E:10b-25: som nyi yid gnyis ma byed cig / phyag rgya bzhi 'brel bzlas pa ni //
T02TD1853E:10b-26: nyis brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga ste //
T02TD1853E:10b-27: de ni dgu brgya rnam pa bsgres //
T02TD1853E:10b-28: zhag gcig tu ni nyi shu bzhis //
T02TD1853E:10b-29: khri phrag gnyis dang gcig stong dang //
T02TD1853E:10b-30: brgya phrag drug tu dus thams cad //
T02TD1853E:10b-31: rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po yis //
T02TD1853E:10b-32: nyin mtshan bzlas brjod grangs byed do //
T02TD1853E:10b-33: 'di yi rnam pas chos thams cad //
T02TD1853E:10b-34: sgyu ma dang ni smig rgyu dang //
T02TD1853E:10b-35: brag ca mgal me'i 'khor lo dang //
T02TD1853E:10b-36: 'khrul pa dri za'i grong khyer dang //
T02TD1853E:10b-37: chu bur dang ni mig 'phrul dang //
T02TD1853E:10b-38: gzugs brnyan chu zla la sogs par //
T02TD1853E:10b-39: thams cad shes shing sa bcu pa'i //
T02TD1853E:10b-40: dbang phyug rnams dang skal mnyam ste //
T02TD1853E:10b-41: rang bzhin bzlas pa 'di la ni //
T02TD1853E:10b-43: 'di ni thog ma med dus nas //
T02TD1853E:10b-44: rang bzhin yang dag rtag zlo yang //
T02TD1853E:10b-45: bla ma yang dag ma bsten par //
T02TD1853E:10b-47: de ni yang dag shes nas ni //
T02TD1853E:10b-48: bsgom pa'i bar chad phyi rol gyi //
T02TD1853E:10b-49: bzlas pa yongs su spang bar bya //
T02TD1853E:10b-50: bzlas pa'i ngo bo chen po mchog / rdo rje 'chang ba brjod med sku //
T02TD1853E:10b-51: bsam brjod yul las rab 'das pas //
T02TD1853E:11a-2: de bas glang chen rnyed gyur pa //
T02TD1853E:11a-3: rjes kyis de la ci zhig bya //
T02TD1853E:11a-4: don de la gnas rnal 'byor che //
T02TD1853E:11a-5: phyi rol yang ni rten mi 'gal //
T02TD1853E:11a-6: glang po che yi stobs kyis ni //
T02TD1853E:11a-8: de bas rdo rje bzlas pa mchog /'bad pas bde gshegs thams cad kyi //
T02TD1853E:11a-9: byin brlabs nyid ni 'ong bas na //
T02TD1853E:11a-10: phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa yi //
T02TD1853E:11a-12: de 'byung cho ga la gnas pas //
T02TD1853E:11a-13: skad cig gis ni kun mkhyen che //
T02TD1853E:11a-14: rgyud las rab tu 'pho bar ni //
T02TD1853E:11a-15: the tshom med par nges pas na //
T02TD1853E:11a-17: de ltar dga' gsum bye brag gi //
T02TD1853E:11a-18: thig le rnam gsum bsgom pa yi //
T02TD1853E:11a-19: cho ga yang dag bstan pa'o //
T02TD1853E:11a-20: da ni gnyis med ye shes nyid //
T02TD1853E:11a-21: kun rdzob gzugs la brten nas kyang //
T02TD1853E:11a-22: mi g-yo la sogs g-yo dang bcas //
T02TD1853E:11a-23: tshangs sogs lha dang lha min sogs //
T02TD1853E:11a-24: thams cad rab tu mi snang yang //
T02TD1853E:11a-26: rgyu dang mi rgyur bcas pa kun //
T02TD1853E:11a-27: slar yang de las 'byung bar byed //
T02TD1853E:11a-28: de las skye bo rnams kyis ni //
T02TD1853E:11a-29: yang dag ma rtogs pa yi phyir //
T02TD1853E:11a-30: tshangs pa'i sgo nga las skyes par //
T02TD1853E:11a-31: 'khrul pas chos rnams kyis mi bsgul //
T02TD1853E:11a-32: gang gis kyang ni mi shigs pa //
T02TD1853E:11a-33: ji srid 'di ni lus gnas pas //
T02TD1853E:11a-34: las dang las min rab byed pa //
T02TD1853E:11a-35: brtan po 'jigs pa ra ba spangs pa'i //
T02TD1853E:11a-36: mi shigs thig le bsgom par bshad //
T02TD1853E:11a-37: tshangs pa'i spyod pa bzhi po dang //
T02TD1853E:11a-38: phyi rol stong bcas la sogs pa //
T02TD1853E:11a-39: rang gi lha ru bskyed nas kyang //
T02TD1853E:11a-40: phyag rgya bzhis ni rgyas btab pa //
T02TD1853E:11a-41: snga ma bzhin du shes byas nas //
T02TD1853E:11a-42: rim pa 'di yi thig le la //
T02TD1853E:11a-43: rang gi sems ni yang dag bzung //
T02TD1853E:11a-44: rang gi ye shes sems dpa' yi //
T02TD1853E:11a-45: mtshan ma'i dbus gnas sa bon las //
T02TD1853E:11a-48: de yis khams kun khyab byas nas //
T02TD1853E:11a-49: dbugs kyi rta zhon kun rtog rnams //
T02TD1853E:11a-50: rnam par bsal te de dag kyang //
T02TD1853E:11b-0: gnyis pa'i dkyil 'khor bsdu @11b byas nas //
T02TD1853E:11b-1: ye shes ngo bo sna bug g-yon //
T02TD1853E:11b-2: zhugs byas mtshan ma'i dbus gnas bya //
T02TD1853E:11b-3: sa bon la ni thim pas kyang //
T02TD1853E:11b-4: de ni phyogs dus gnas pa yi //
T02TD1853E:11b-5: sangs rgyas yon tan ci gsungs pa //
T02TD1853E:11b-6: yang dag skyed byed mi shigs pa'i //
T02TD1853E:11b-8: rnam par gsal byas de las kyang //
T02TD1853E:11b-10: ye shes sems dpa'i nang gsal te //
T02TD1853E:11b-11: de yi phyi yi dkyil 'khor dang //
T02TD1853E:11b-12: nang ni gsal bya de las byung //
T02TD1853E:11b-13: mthe bo'i rtsa dang rje ngar dang //
T02TD1853E:11b-14: bral gnyis dang ni gsang ba'i gnas //
T02TD1853E:11b-15: lte ba dang ni gsus pa dang ;
T02TD1853E:11b-16: / nu ma gnyis dang lag rtse dang //
T02TD1853E:11b-17: mgrin pa dang ni mchu gnyis dang //
T02TD1853E:11b-18: 'gram pa gnyis dang mig gnyis dang //
T02TD1853E:11b-19: rna ba'i rtsa dang spyi bo dang //
T02TD1853E:11b-20: tshigs kun thig le a'a: sogs kyi //
T02TD1853E:11b-21: gzugs su gnas pa bsgrub byas nas //
T02TD1853E:11b-22: mi shigs thig ler thim par bya //
T02TD1853E:11b-23: der ni rang gi sems cung zad //
T02TD1853E:11b-24: gzung bas rten dang rten can gyi //
T02TD1853E:11b-25: 'khor lor mos byas de dbus su //
T02TD1853E:11b-26: mi shigs thig le ye shes la //
T02TD1853E:11b-27: snang ba'i ngo bo bsgom par bya //
T02TD1853E:11b-28: de yi 'od kyis rang gnas sogs //
T02TD1853E:11b-29: gsal byas ye shes thig le yi //
T02TD1853E:11b-30: nang gsal gzhag pa'i 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1853E:11b-31: phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i //
T02TD1853E:11b-32: spyan sngar bdud rtsi zhu byas nas //
T02TD1853E:11b-33: zhal du zhugs nas snying ga yi //
T02TD1853E:11b-34: mi shigs thig ler rab song ste //
T02TD1853E:11b-35: kshum gzugs bdud rtsir rab blangs nas //
T02TD1853E:11b-36: rdo rje'i lam nas phyung nas su //
T02TD1853E:11b-37: 'o ma'i rgyun ltar phyogs bcu nas ;
T02TD1853E:11b-38: /'ongs pa yis ni sems can dang //
T02TD1853E:11b-39: sangs rgyas rnams dang mi rgyur bcas //
T02TD1853E:11b-40: yang dag bsdus nas gur sogs zhugs //
T02TD1853E:11b-41: de bzhin chos dbyings phyag rgya dang //
T02TD1853E:11b-42: rten gyi 'khor lor zhugs byas nas //
T02TD1853E:11b-43: de dag yang ni rab bsdus te //
T02TD1853E:11b-44: dkyil 'khor du ni rab bsdus nas //
T02TD1853E:11b-45: de yang bdag la bsdu byas te //
T02TD1853E:11b-46: bdag nyid kyang ni mi snang bar //
T02TD1853E:11b-47: ye shes sems dpa'i gnas la dmigs //
T02TD1853E:11b-49: ye shes sems dpar zhugs par bya //
T02TD1853E:11b-50: ye shes sems dpa' mi snang nas //
T02TD1853E:12a-2: mtshan ma de yang bsdu byas nas //
T02TD1853E:12a-3: mi shigs thig ler sems bzung ste //
T02TD1853E:12a-4: de las yang ni nang gi tshogs //
T02TD1853E:12a-5: kun bsdus rang snang thig le che //
T02TD1853E:12a-6: 'ba' zhig la sems yang dag bzung //
T02TD1853E:12a-7: ci ltar nus bzhin bsgom pas der //
T02TD1853E:12a-8: sems ni yang dang yang du zhugs //
T02TD1853E:12a-9: yang ni de las phyir byung ste //
T02TD1853E:12a-10: de yi gnas dang rang gi lus //
T02TD1853E:12a-12: rten dang khams gsum snang bar bya //
T02TD1853E:12a-13: de nas yang ni gong ma ltar //
T02TD1853E:12a-14: rim par bcug nas thim byas la //
T02TD1853E:12a-15: sems ni thig ler gzhag par bya //
T02TD1853E:12a-16: rang gi dbang po der bzung nas //
T02TD1853E:12a-17: sa yi dkyil 'khor chu la zhugs //
T02TD1853E:12a-18: chu de me la de bzhin zhugs //
T02TD1853E:12a-19: me yang rlung la rab tu zhugs //
T02TD1853E:12a-20: rlung yang sems la zhugs par gyur //
T02TD1853E:12a-21: sems ni gnyis med ye shes su //
T02TD1853E:12a-22: cung zad zhugs pas rtags gnas pa ;
T02TD1853E:12a-23: / smig rgyu 'dra dang du ba dang //
T02TD1853E:12a-24: mar me mkha' snang rab 'dra ba //
T02TD1853E:12a-25: sprin med nam mkha' ltar snang ba'i //
T02TD1853E:12a-27: rdo rje sems dpa' zhugs phyir ro //
T02TD1853E:12a-28: thig le la ni sems bzung ste //
T02TD1853E:12a-29: glal zhing dgod dang 'dar la sogs //
T02TD1853E:12a-31: thig le yang dag spro byas nas //
T02TD1853E:12a-32: gong ma'i rim pas kun khyab bya //
T02TD1853E:12a-33: 'di ni yang dag goms byas pas //
T02TD1853E:12a-34: mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa che //
T02TD1853E:12a-35: thabs kun gyis ni bsgrub bya mchog / rdo rje 'chang ba chen po thob //
T02TD1853E:12a-36: 'di ni lhan cig skyes pa yi //
T02TD1853E:12a-37: ye shes 'ba' zhig dbang byas nas //
T02TD1853E:12a-38: rim pa gnyis pa bsgom pa'i thabs //
T02TD1853E:12a-39: mi shigs thig le bsgom pa'o //
T02TD1853E:12a-40: de ltar chos kun de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1853E:12a-41: dpag med dam pa'i phun sum tshogs //
T02TD1853E:12a-42: de dmigs yang dag skyes 'gyur ba //
T02TD1853E:12a-43: bsgom pa'i cho ga rnams bshad nas //
T02TD1853E:12a-44: rnam grangs dag kyang yongs su bstan //
T02TD1853E:12a-45: de bzhin nyid dang yang dag mtha' //
T02TD1853E:12a-46: bsam gyis mi khyab pa yi dbyings //
T02TD1853E:12a-47: chos nyid dang ni chos skyon med //
T02TD1853E:12a-48: stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med //
T02TD1853E:12a-49: smon pa med pa nyid dang yang //
T02TD1853E:12a-50: nyon mongs khur chen 'dor byed pa //
T02TD1853E:12b-0: skye ba med dang 'od gsal @12b ba ;
T02TD1853E:12b-1: / mngon par byang ni chub pa dang //
T02TD1853E:12b-2: gzhan gyi sems shes byed pa dang //
T02TD1853E:12b-3: lha yi rna ba ster ba dang //
T02TD1853E:12b-4: de bzhin lha yi mig ster dang //
T02TD1853E:12b-5: rdzu 'phrul dpag med sprul chen dang //
T02TD1853E:12b-6: dngos po mthar ni phyin pa dang //
T02TD1853E:12b-7: don dam pa yi bden pa dang //
T02TD1853E:12b-8: rdzogs pa yi ni rim pa dang /
T02TD1853E:12b-9: yongs su dag pa'i sku gtsang dang //
T02TD1853E:12b-10: kun gyis bstan bya nyid dag dang //
T02TD1853E:12b-11: mkha' ltar rnam par dag pa dang //
T02TD1853E:12b-12: glo bur dri mas mi gos dang //
T02TD1853E:12b-13: gdod nas 'od gsal ba nyid dang //
T02TD1853E:12b-14: gang gis kyang ni mi shigs dang //
T02TD1853E:12b-15: dngos po med pa nyid dang ni //
T02TD1853E:12b-16: rgyu sogs bcu gnyis 'byung byed dang //
T02TD1853E:12b-17: dpal chen ye shes yongs dag dang //
T02TD1853E:12b-18: thig le chen po yongs dag dang //
T02TD1853E:12b-19: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen dang //
T02TD1853E:12b-20: nam mkha' nam mkha'i spyod yul dang //
T02TD1853E:12b-21: bsgom pa med pa nyid dang ni //
T02TD1853E:12b-22: rje btsun man ngag chen po dang //
T02TD1853E:12b-23: sna nas rna bar 'pho byed dang //
T02TD1853E:12b-24: nyan thos kyis ni shes min dang//
T02TD1853E:12b-25: rang sangs rgyas sogs mi shes dang //
T02TD1853E:12b-26: yi ge med pa nyid dang ni //
T02TD1853E:12b-27: tshig dang bral dang brjod med sogs //
T02TD1853E:12b-28: de la mdo dang rgyud rnams las //
T02TD1853E:12b-29: de 'dra rnam pa mtha' yas pa //
T02TD1853E:12b-30: gsungs shing yang dag gsung 'gyur pa //
T02TD1853E:12b-31: der ni de bzhin nyid 'di las //
T02TD1853E:12b-32: gzhan ni ci yang ma gsungs so //
T02TD1853E:12b-33: de bas dad pa sngon 'gro ba'i //
T02TD1853E:12b-34: sems kyis chos kun de bzhin nyid //
T02TD1853E:12b-35: zab gsal gnyis med don chen po //
T02TD1853E:12b-36: rim pa gnyis pa de kho na //
T02TD1853E:12b-37: bla ma'i gsung ni yang dag gzung //
T02TD1853E:12b-38: de bzung gong ma'i rim pa yis //
T02TD1853E:12b-39: rtag tu goms byed skyes bu gang //
T02TD1853E:12b-40: de la brten pa'i rtags skyes nas //
T02TD1853E:12b-41: sa nas sar ni 'phar ba ltar //
T02TD1853E:12b-42: de yi rnam pa gong du 'phel //
T02TD1853E:12b-43: rig 'dzin la sogs sprul pa yis //
T02TD1853E:12b-44: gzhan ni don de la sbyor byed //
T02TD1853E:12b-46: sgrub pa'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur //
T02TD1853E:12b-47: bdag nyid can nges bsgrub pa'i mchog / ji skad gsungs pa brtsam par bya //
T02TD1853E:12b-48: lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo //
T02TD1853E:12b-50: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams //
T02TD1853E:12b-51: rang gi nus pas brtsams par bya //
T02TD1853E:12b-52: smyon pa'i brtul zhugs la sogs pas //
T02TD1853E:12b-53: zla drug sogs par rab tu 'bad //
T02TD1853E:13a-2: dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun ngo bo //
T02TD1853E:13a-3: rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad gnas //
T02TD1853E:13a-4: chos kun de bzhin nyid zab pa //
T02TD1853E:13a-5: sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsgrub bya mchog / gong ma'i rim pa rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1853E:13a-6: 'bad pa che thang rab byas pas //
T02TD1853E:13a-7: de ltar de ru mtshan nyid kyi //
T02TD1853E:13a-8: tshul du cung zad rab gnas pa'i //
T02TD1853E:13a-9: dga' dang dga' ba bar ma dang //
T02TD1853E:13a-10: dga' dang bral ba'i dus su yang //
T02TD1853E:13a-11: ji bzhin gnas pa'i dga' ba gsum //
T02TD1853E:13a-12: ji skad gsungs pa thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1853E:13a-13: de nas mtha' med 'khor ba'i bar //
T02TD1853E:13a-14: rtag pa dang ni mi gdung dang ;
T02TD1853E:13a-15: / bsil ba dang ni gcig pa dang //
T02TD1853E:13a-16: bde ba dang ni dri med dang //
T02TD1853E:13a-17: dga' ba dang ni yid dga' ba //
T02TD1853E:13a-18: 'di ni bde chen ro myang brgyad //
T02TD1853E:13a-19: bdag po rdo rje 'chang ba mchog / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1853E:13a-20: bya ba byas pa byed pa byas //
T02TD1853E:13a-21: dbang phyug chen po khur chen bor //
T02TD1853E:13a-22: tsher ma dkrugs pa thams cad mkhyen //
T02TD1853E:13a-23: skyes bu dpa' bo cang shes pa //
T02TD1853E:13a-24: glang po chen po dul ba bo //
T02TD1853E:13a-25: 'khor ba'i mtha' ni pha rol son //
T02TD1853E:13a-26: don dam dang ni kun rdzob kyi //
T02TD1853E:13a-27: bden pa gnyis med rnal 'byor che //
T02TD1853E:13a-28: thab spangs pa'am lam kun rdzogs //
T02TD1853E:13a-29: yon tan 'byung gnas kun du bzang //
T02TD1853E:13a-30: thams cad 'dus pa'i de kho na //
T02TD1853E:13a-32: gong na med pa yang dag gnas //
T02TD1853E:13a-33: de ltar de sogs rab grags pa //
T02TD1853E:13a-34: ming ni rnam pa mtha' yas pa //
T02TD1853E:13a-35: gnyis med ye shes mtshon pa ste //
T02TD1853E:13a-36: mdo dang rgyud rnams thams cad du //
T02TD1853E:13a-37: blo ldan rnams kyis rtogs par bya //
T02TD1853E:13a-38: sa bcu dang ni rab ldan pa'i //
T02TD1853E:13a-39: gong ma'i lha mo rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD1853E:13a-40: dge ba bcu gsum la gnas pa //
T02TD1853E:13a-41: skad cig gis ni yang dag tu //
T02TD1853E:13a-42: sgrib bral de yis rtogs par byed //
T02TD1853E:13a-43: phreng ba ha ra nu pur sogs //
T02TD1853E:13a-44: mdog dang ku tsa la sogs pa //
T02TD1853E:13a-45: padma brtags pa'i dga' shes pa //
T02TD1853E:13a-46: dang por rab tu shes par bya //
T02TD1853E:13a-48: glu dbyangs bstod dang sid sgra yi //
T02TD1853E:13a-49: snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis dga' 'gyur bas //
T02TD1853E:13a-50: gnyis pa ru ni shes par bya //
T02TD1853E:13a-51: tsandan la sogs sna tshogs dris //
T02TD1853E:13b-0: lus byugs lhan cig @13b rtsen byed tshe //
T02TD1853E:13b-1: dga' ba yang dag thob byed pa //
T02TD1853E:13b-2: gsum pa ru ni shes par bya //
T02TD1853E:13b-3: ma mchu sbrang rtsis gzhib byas pas //
T02TD1853E:13b-4: mgor gnas byang chub sems 'ju bas //
T02TD1853E:13b-5: ro 'thung dga' bas bdag mnyes pas //
T02TD1853E:13b-6: bzhi par rab tu shes par bya //
T02TD1853E:13b-7: lus la byug cing sna tshogs kyi //
T02TD1853E:13b-8: spyod pas rtsen tshe reg bya yis //
T02TD1853E:13b-9: yang dag dga' bar byed pas na //
T02TD1853E:13b-10: lnga ba ru ni shes par bya //
T02TD1853E:13b-11: de yis ye shes rnam pa gsum //
T02TD1853E:13b-12: rig par byed cing rang gi yid //
T02TD1853E:13b-13: yang dag dga' bar rab byed pa //
T02TD1853E:13b-14: drug par shes bya rnal 'byor bas //
T02TD1853E:13b-15: de yi lus ni bdag gi ni //
T02TD1853E:13b-16: rten du gnas pa sra ba yis //
T02TD1853E:13b-17: yang dag dga' bar byed pas na //
T02TD1853E:13b-18: bdun pa ru ni shes par bya //
T02TD1853E:13b-19: de yi padma'i zil sogs dang //
T02TD1853E:13b-20: byang sems rlan gyis rang gi sems //
T02TD1853E:13b-21: rab tu dga' bar byed pas na //
T02TD1853E:13b-22: brgyad par rab tu shes par bya //
T02TD1853E:13b-23: gsang gnas drod sogs tsha ba yis //
T02TD1853E:13b-24: bdag gi yid ni yang dag par //
T02TD1853E:13b-25: dga' bar byed pa'i mchog yin pas //
T02TD1853E:13b-26: dgu pa ru ni shes par bya //
T02TD1853E:13b-27: de nas bskyod pas ye shes mes //
T02TD1853E:13b-28: phung po khams sogs sreg byed pas //
T02TD1853E:13b-29: yid ni yang dag dga' 'gyur bas //
T02TD1853E:13b-30: bcu par rab tu shes par bya //
T02TD1853E:13b-31: bcu po de yis dang po dang //
T02TD1853E:13b-33: gang du gsungs pa rab thob ste //
T02TD1853E:13b-34: de bas de 'dra'i don chen la //
T02TD1853E:13b-35: yang dag 'jug par mi nus pa'i //
T02TD1853E:13b-36: gdul bya rnams la bde gshegs kyis //
T02TD1853E:13b-37: rab tu dga' sogs mtshan nyid du //
T02TD1853E:13b-38: bstan nas de yi don zhugs pas //
T02TD1853E:13b-39: de yis rtogs kyang bla dang bcas //
T02TD1853E:13b-40: de nyid dang po'i rnal 'byor la //
T02TD1853E:13b-41: rten dang rten can dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02TD1853E:13b-42: 'khor lo rab tu brtan byas nas //
T02TD1853E:13b-43: de zhugs de la brtan byas pas //
T02TD1853E:13b-44: rtogs kyang don 'di ma shes na //
T02TD1853E:13b-45: yang dag sangs rgyas ma yin no //
T02TD1853E:13b-47: gcig pu rab tu che ba'i lha /
T02TD1853E:13b-48: lhag pa'i lha zhes bya ba ni //
T02TD1853E:13b-49: bcu gsum pa zhes bya bar bshad //
T02TD1853E:13b-50: de ltar rim pa gnyis pa yi //
T02TD1853E:13b-51: de bzhin nyid ni thabs bcas pa'i //
T02TD1853E:13b-53: 'thung bar byed pa sangs rgyas kyi //
T02TD1853E:13b-54: de yi sras su nges pa ste //
T02TD1853E:14a-0: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi @14a * //
T02TD1853E:14a-2: rig pa 'dzin pa'i dpon po ste //
T02TD1853E:14a-4: nyan thos rang 'dren rnams kyi ni //
T02TD1853E:14a-5: 'dren par byed pa'i gtso bo ste //
T02TD1853E:14a-6: sems can phal ba'i rje btsun no //
T02TD1853E:14a-7: de la phyogs bcu khams bzhugs pa'i //
T02TD1853E:14a-8: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD1853E:14a-9: rig pa'i lha dang khro bo sogs //
T02TD1853E:14a-10: me tog la sogs mchod par bcas //
T02TD1853E:14a-11: zhag gcig skya rengs dang po dang //
T02TD1853E:14a-12: phyed ni dros pa'i dus nyid dang //
T02TD1853E:14a-13: chal chil mtshams su nam mkha' las //
T02TD1853E:14a-14: mchod pa byas nas sngags brjod cing //
T02TD1853E:14a-16: de bas dag pa'i lha rnams kyang //
T02TD1853E:14a-17: de bzhin du ni mchod byed na //
T02TD1853E:14a-18: ma dag pa yi lha rnams ni //
T02TD1853E:14a-19: de la ci yi phyir mi mchod //
T02TD1853E:14a-20: sems can phal pa gzhan gyis ni //
T02TD1853E:14a-21: me tog snyim pa bkang nas ni //
T02TD1853E:14a-22: mgrin pa dma' bas zhabs 'dud cing //
T02TD1853E:14a-23: rtag tu bkur bar shin tu 'os //
T02TD1853E:14a-24: de ni skyes bu rkang gnyis gtso //
T02TD1853E:14a-25: kun mkhyen rnams kyis bzhag pa ste //
T02TD1853E:14a-26: phyin log khur chen por byed pas //
T02TD1853E:14a-28: de la brnyas byed sems can gang //
T02TD1853E:14a-29: sgrub pa po de glang dang 'dra //
T02TD1853E:14a-30: de yis nga la brnyas byed pas //
T02TD1853E:14a-31: ngas ni de kun dus kun spong //
T02TD1853E:14a-32: cig shos lus la ngag nas phyir //
T02TD1853E:14a-33: mchod cing brjod pas lus rnams kyi //
T02TD1853E:14a-34: sgrib pa de yis dag byed do //
T02TD1853E:14a-35: rim pa gnyis 'dir sgrub pa po //
T02TD1853E:14a-36: rtse gcig pa yis rnam par gzung //
T02TD1853E:14a-37: de gzung tshe 'di nyid la yang //
T02TD1853E:14a-38: brtul zhugs cho ga nyid kyis ni //
T02TD1853E:14a-39: lha mos rkyen ni rab byas te //
T02TD1853E:14a-40: phyag rgya chen po rang rgyud la //
T02TD1853E:14a-42: da ni rang nyid byin brlabs pa'i //
T02TD1853E:14a-44: bya bas bskal ba 'ga' zhig la //
T02TD1853E:14a-45: yang dag tu ni bshad par bya //
T02TD1853E:14a-46: gang zhig bla ma mnyes byas nas //
T02TD1853E:14a-47: nges gnang dam sngom bcas pa ru //
T02TD1853E:14a-48: bum pa la sogs pa thob ste //
T02TD1853E:14a-49: bla ma'i zhal las rnyed pa yi //
T02TD1853E:14a-50: de bzhin nyid ni rab thob cing //
T02TD1853E:14a-51: gsang dang mchog tu gsang rigs pas //
T02TD1853E:14a-52: ji skad bshad pa'i bya ba yis //
T02TD1853E:14a-53: yang dag bsgom ni mi nus pas //
T02TD1853E:14a-54: ji bzhin pa yi de kho na //
T02TD1853E:14b-0: rim pa 'di @14b yis bsgom par bya //
T02TD1853E:14b-1: gang zhig dus ni phyi zhig ka la //
T02TD1853E:14b-2: 'chi ba'i mtshan ma bdag gis mthong //
T02TD1853E:14b-3: 'chi bar gyur pa'i dus byung na //
T02TD1853E:14b-4: nad kyis yang dag ma rnyogs par //
T02TD1853E:14b-5: 'pho ba'i sbyor ba yang dag bya //
T02TD1853E:14b-6: dpral ba dang ni lte ba dang //
T02TD1853E:14b-7: spyi gtsug dang ni mig dang ni //
T02TD1853E:14b-8: rna ba dang ni sna dag dang //
T02TD1853E:14b-9: chu yi gnas dang chu min gnas //
T02TD1853E:14b-10: kha yi gnas dang ye shes kyi //
T02TD1853E:14b-12: dpral ba gzugs kyi khams kyi ni //
T02TD1853E:14b-13: rtags skyes pa ru shes par bya //
T02TD1853E:14b-14: lte bar 'dod khams lha rnams kyi //
T02TD1853E:14b-15: rtags byung de ru skye bar nges //
T02TD1853E:14b-16: spyi gtsug gzugs med khams rnams kyi //
T02TD1853E:14b-17: rtags byung de ru skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1853E:14b-18: rna gnyis ye shes 'pho ba na //
T02TD1853E:14b-19: gnod sbyin gnas su skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1853E:14b-20: sna gnyis rig pa 'dzin pa yi //
T02TD1853E:14b-22: mig gnyis mi rnams rgal por 'gyur //
T02TD1853E:14b-23: rtags ni yang dag skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1853E:14b-24: kha ru ye shes 'pho ba na //
T02TD1853E:14b-25: yid dags rtags su shes par bya //
T02TD1853E:14b-26: chu gnas dud 'gro rnams kyi ni //
T02TD1853E:14b-27: rtags su yang dag rab shes bya //
T02TD1853E:14b-28: chu min bu gar ye shes 'gro //
T02TD1853E:14b-29: dmyal ba'i rtags su shes par bya //
T02TD1853E:14b-30: de ltar ye shes 'pho ba yi //
T02TD1853E:14b-31: rnam pa'i cha ni shes byas nas //
T02TD1853E:14b-32: sgrogs pa lnga yi yi ge yis //
T02TD1853E:14b-33: steng gi sgo bdun dgag par bya //
T02TD1853E:14b-34: chu yi sgo ru sum gis dgag / chu min kshum gis dgag par bya //
T02TD1853E:14b-35: de ltar sgo dgu bkag nas kyang //
T02TD1853E:14b-36: rim pa 'di yis rang sems kyi //
T02TD1853E:14b-37: gnas ni rab tu btsal byas pas //
T02TD1853E:14b-38: dbyings nyid du ni nges par 'gro //
T02TD1853E:14b-39: phung po skye mched khams rnams su //
T02TD1853E:14b-40: rnal 'byor rgyud kyis dpyad pa ltar //
T02TD1853E:14b-41: rnam par bsgom byas ye shes so //
T02TD1853E:14b-42: gong na med pa rtogs par 'gyur //
T02TD1853E:14b-43: bdag nyid ji skad gsungs pa bzhin //
T02TD1853E:14b-44: lha yi lus su gyur byas pa //
T02TD1853E:14b-45: chos kyi dbyings dang rnam shes dang //
T02TD1853E:14b-46: bdag nyid sangs rgyas skur byas pa'i //
T02TD1853E:14b-47: gnas ni rin chen sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD1853E:14b-48: kha dog sna lngas rab brgyan pa'i //
T02TD1853E:14b-49: rdo rje rtse mo dgu pa mchog / bdag gi spyi bo'i steng du ni //
T02TD1853E:14b-50: bsams nas de ru rang gi sems //
T02TD1853E:14b-51: rdo rje dkar po bcu tshal tsam //
T02TD1853E:15a-2: yar gyi rtse lnga thabs lnga ste //
T02TD1853E:15a-3: de bzhin mar bltas shes rab lnga //
T02TD1853E:15a-4: dbus kyi bum pa ri bong can //
T02TD1853E:15a-5: bsams nas de ru ye shes che //
T02TD1853E:15a-6: ser po byang chub sems 'dra ba //
T02TD1853E:15a-8: thig le tsa na ka yi 'bru //
T02TD1853E:15a-9: lnga 'byor tshad du bsgom par bya //
T02TD1853E:15a-10: de nas chos kun thams cad kun //
T02TD1853E:15a-11: med par bsams nas bdag dmigs te //
T02TD1853E:15a-12: bdag kyang bdag la thim byas nas //
T02TD1853E:15a-13: sems tsam de yang mda' bzhin du //
T02TD1853E:15a-14: spyi bor rdo rje 'og cha yi //
T02TD1853E:15a-15: sbu gur zhugs nas thig ler thim //
T02TD1853E:15a-16: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams //
T02TD1853E:15a-17: lha mo rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi //
T02TD1853E:15a-18: gnas su shes par rab tu bya //
T02TD1853E:15a-19: de ni gdod nas grub pa'i gzugs //
T02TD1853E:15a-20: de ru shes par bzhugs pa //
T02TD1853E:15a-21: sems de yang dang yang du gzung //
T02TD1853E:15a-22: de las sems de yar ba ltar //
T02TD1853E:15a-23: rdo rje rtse dgu steng cha yi //
T02TD1853E:15a-24: sbu gur byung nas sna tshogs kyi //
T02TD1853E:15a-25: padmar zla ba gnas pa la //
T02TD1853E:15a-26: rdo rje sems dpa'i skur gyur te //
T02TD1853E:15a-27: mtshan dang dpe byad kun brgyan pa //
T02TD1853E:15a-28: rgyan kun brgyan pa'i na bza' dang //
T02TD1853E:15a-29: bral nas shin tu gsal dmigs te //
T02TD1853E:15a-30: de gnyis med pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1853E:15a-31: byin rlabs las byung 'khor lo che //
T02TD1853E:15a-33: de ltar rnam par bsgom pa mchog / yang dang yang du ci nus bsgom //
T02TD1853E:15a-34: bsam pa de yi rkyen gyis ni //
T02TD1853E:15a-35: bdag sems dbyings su zhugs pa'i tshe //
T02TD1853E:15a-36: gsal zhing rab dag mkha' 'dra rtogs //
T02TD1853E:15a-37: de nas rdzu 'phrul shugs ldan pa //
T02TD1853E:15a-38: lo lnga lon pa'i byis pa'i gzugs //
T02TD1853E:15a-39: 'grub tshe dpe med bde rdzogs rtogs //
T02TD1853E:15a-40: de las skye gnas gzhan du ni //
T02TD1853E:15a-41: 'phel bar byed tshe sprul pa'i gzugs //
T02TD1853E:15a-42: yang dag tu ni rtogs par 'gyur //
T02TD1853E:15a-43: de lta bas na sems can gyi //
T02TD1853E:15a-44: bsam pa gang dang gang dag gis //
T02TD1853E:15a-45: mi rnams yid ni yang dag sbyor //
T02TD1853E:15a-46: de dang de ni mdo bzhin du //
T02TD1853E:15a-47: sna tshogs nor bu lta bur 'gyur //
T02TD1853E:15a-48: chos sku rab dga' mkha' mnyam pa //
T02TD1853E:15a-49: shi dang brgyal dang gnyid log dang //
T02TD1853E:15a-50: glal dang 'khrig dus skad cig tsam //
T02TD1853E:15a-51: myong bar 'gyur bas rab bsgoms na //
T02TD1853E:15a-52: lus can rnams ni yid ni sbyong //
T02TD1853E:15a-53: cho ga 'di yis sems can gang //
T02TD1853E:15b-0: @15b mtshams med byed cing rmongs pa yi //
T02TD1853E:15b-1: skye bo bram ze gsod pa yang //
T02TD1853E:15b-2: de yis mi 'grub cung zad med //
T02TD1853E:15b-3: de bas bka' lung rab thob nas //
T02TD1853E:15b-4: dam sngom rnam par bsrung byas te //
T02TD1853E:15b-5: sku gsum 'grub par the tshom med //
T02TD1853E:15b-6: gal te sku gsum ma grub na //
T02TD1853E:15b-8: rim gyis phyag rgya chen por 'gyur //
T02TD1853E:15b-9: de ltar rnam pa gsum gyis ni //
T02TD1853E:15b-10: dngos grub de ni bsgom pa bshad //
T02TD1853E:15b-11: gang zhig 'di ni ma rtogs par //
T02TD1853E:15b-12: gsang ba smra bar byed pa ni //
T02TD1853E:15b-13: de ni nga dang de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1853E:15b-14: nam zhig de la sbyar byas pas //
T02TD1853E:15b-15: byin gyis rlob par mi byed do //
T02TD1853E:15b-17: nga ni de yi lus gnas te //
T02TD1853E:15b-18: bsgrub pa gzhan la mchod pa len //
T02TD1853E:15b-19: de yis de mnyes rang gi rgyud //
T02TD1853E:15b-20: las kyi sgrib pa dag byed do //
T02TD1853E:15b-22: gang gi dus su gnas pa der //
T02TD1853E:15b-23: sangs rgyas bstan pa rin chen yang //
T02TD1853E:15b-24: gnas pa rab tu bshad pa yin //
T02TD1853E:15b-25: brgyud pa'i rim pa 'di chad nas //
T02TD1853E:15b-26: sangs rgyas bstan pa nub pa ru //
T02TD1853E:15b-27: kun gyis rab tu shes par bya //
T02TD1853E:15b-28: de bas khyod kyi yid gcig tu //
T02TD1853E:15b-29: yang dag bsdus la ma 'ongs pa'i //
T02TD1853E:15b-30: gang zag sngon du tshogs bskyed pa'i//
T02TD1853E:15b-31: skal ldan 'ga' la rnam par brgyud //
T02TD1853E:15b-32: sim byed 'di la sbyor du chug /'di sbyor 'di ni yang dag pa'i //
T02TD1853E:15b-33: rnal 'byor pa ru shes par bya //
T02TD1853E:15b-34: khyod kyang zas kyi spyod pa dang //
T02TD1853E:15b-35: nga la cung zad 'khrul rtogs pas //
T02TD1853E:15b-36: khyod kyis tshe 'di nyid la ni //
T02TD1853E:15b-37: gzugs bcas pung po rang lus ni //
T02TD1853E:15b-38: gnas ni yang dag mi 'gyur te //
T02TD1853E:15b-39: rnam par shes pa mi shigs pa //
T02TD1853E:15b-40: phyag rgya chen por rab tu 'grub //
T02TD1853E:15b-41: de bas khyod kyis yang dag blos //
T02TD1853E:15b-42: sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dus pa'i rgyud //
T02TD1853E:15b-43: gsang chen gsang las ches gsang ba //
T02TD1853E:15b-44: gong na med pa'i lung chen po //
T02TD1853E:15b-45: 'di yi rim pa dang po yi //
T02TD1853E:15b-46: sgrub pa'i thabs dang sbyin sreg dang //
T02TD1853E:15b-47: gtor ma sna tshogs 'khor lo dang //
T02TD1853E:15b-48: bsdus pa dang ni rnam bshad dang //
T02TD1853E:15b-49: dkyil 'khor cho ga la sogs pa //
T02TD1853E:15b-50: mi shes mun bsgribs sems can gyi //
T02TD1853E:15b-51: thur ma lta bur brtsam par gyis //
T02TD1853E:16a-2: 'di shes bla ma rab mnyes te //
T02TD1853E:16a-3: yang dag 'dod pas blangs byas nas //
T02TD1853E:16a-4: sems ni de nas sbyang bar bya //
T02TD1853E:16a-5: sems ni kun rtogs rnam spangs nas //
T02TD1853E:16a-6: de sbyor de la rig pa skye //
T02TD1853E:16a-7: rig pa skyes nas rdo rje 'dzin //
T02TD1853E:16a-8: nga grub pas na sangs rgyas dang ;
T02TD1853E:16a-9: / pha rol phyin dang gzungs rnams dang //
T02TD1853E:16a-10: sa rnams thams cad bde chen po //
T02TD1853E:16a-12: thams cad bde chen las byung phyir //
T02TD1853E:16a-13: de bsgoms ci phyir de mi 'byung //
T02TD1853E:16a-14: de bas rab tu 'bad pa yis //
T02TD1853E:16a-15: mchog gi de nyid rab gsang gsang //
T02TD1853E:16a-16: smon lam gyis kyang tha na 'grub //
T02TD1853E:16a-17: bsgrub pa la ni shin tu 'bad //
T02TD1853E:16a-19: de ltar rol pa'i gar bcas sgra brnyan lta bu rdo rje'i glu //
T02TD1853E:16a-20: 'khor lor bcas pas de nyid glu blangs bdag la bstod cing der //
T02TD1853E:16a-21: nam mkha'i khams su sprin rnams med pa lta bur thim par gyur //
T02TD1853E:16a-22: dge slong bla ma gnyis bcas de yang de bzhin mi snang gyur //
T02TD1853E:16a-23: rdo rje gdan gyi rgyab nas rgyang grags lnga bcu song ba'i sar //
T02TD1853E:16a-24: parba ta yi phug la brten te sems can don bya'i phyir //
T02TD1853E:16a-25: 'di bsdus rab tu byed pa thams cad rtsom dang ston sogs byas //
T02TD1853E:16a-26: dam pas gsol brgya chen btab pas bdag ni shin tu brod //
T02TD1853E:16a-27: der gnas 'khor bcas rnams kyis yo byad gos zas nor gyi mdzod //
T02TD1853E:16a-28: mchod pa'i yo byad rgya chen sna tshogs 'khor lo bya ba rnams //
T02TD1853E:16a-29: sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpar gyur pa mdzod srung gnod gnas che //
T02TD1853E:16a-30: nyin re k'arsh'a pa na bdun brgyas rtag tu rab tu sbyor //
T02TD1853E:16a-31: de nas bla ma chen po b'a li p'a nga'i drung du bgrod //
T02TD1853E:16a-32: bdag gis bla ma de yang mnyes bya'i phyir na sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02TD1853E:16a-33: cung zad bsdus pas de ru bla ma la sogs kun //
T02TD1853E:16a-34: mnyes par byas te sngon gnas bgrod gnas skal ldan don 'ga' byas //
T02TD1853E:16a-35: de bas de ltar kun gyis gtam rgyud rgyas bar shes byas te //
T02TD1853E:16a-36: mkhas pa'i gzu bod ma pa thabs kun gyis ni mnyes bya ste //
T02TD1853E:16a-37: de yi lung la rab tu byed sogs mnyan dang bsam par bya //
T02TD1853E:16a-38: de la rab brten dgon sogs rab tu brten byas rang gi sems //
T02TD1853E:16a-39: de nyid bsgoms pas ji bzhin rab tu rtogs par byas pa yis //
T02TD1853E:16b-0: tshe 'di nyid @16b la zla ba drug gis byang chub thob pa 'di ni su yis bzlog / bdud rtsi mchog 'thung 'di ni sems can kun gyis bkur ba'i gnas //
T02TD1853E:16b-1: sems can de la rdo rje 'chang dang bde gshegs kun gyis bsngags //
T02TD1853E:16b-2: de'i phyir log ba'i sgrib pa thams cad sa bon nyams byas te //
T02TD1853E:16b-3: 'khor bar gnas kyang skyon gyis mi gos pad bzhin rtag tu gnas //
T02TD1853E:16b-4: de ru ma thob lan grangs gzhan la yang dag myong ba yis //
T02TD1853E:16b-5: 'bras bu smin byed sngags pa'i yid la yang dag 'byung ba yi //
T02TD1853E:16b-6: dngos grub rgya chen thob nas gang g'a'i bye snyed dpag med kyi //
T02TD1853E:16b-7: 'khor gyis bskor nas 'jig rten khams kun thams cad rab tu bgrod //
T02TD1853E:16b-8: de bas chu 'khor drag po khar lhung ltar //
T02TD1853E:16b-9: lus dang ngag dang sems kyis brtson 'grus bskyed //
T02TD1853E:16b-10: rim par sngon bzhin rab tu bsgrub par bya //
T02TD1853E:16b-11: dal 'byor lus 'di shin tu g-yo sla bas //
T02TD1853E:16b-12: ji ltar rlung gis mar me gsod pa ltar //
T02TD1853E:16b-13: skad cig tsam du mi sdong dus 'da' byed //
T02TD1853E:16b-14: de bas 'dir ni chud gsan mi bya ste //
T02TD1853E:16b-15: dngos kun de nyid mchog chen rab bsgom bya //
T02TD1853E:16b-16: de nyid spyod pa 'di la blo nges pas //
T02TD1853E:16b-17: ji skad ba shad bzhin rab tu 'gyur bas na //
T02TD1853E:16b-18: sems ni yang dag brten par gyis shig ces //
T02TD1853E:16b-19: bdag ni sems can rnams la gsol ba 'debs //
T02TD1853E:16b-20: gang gi phyir na 'di ni gsang bas na //
T02TD1853E:16b-21: bdag gis gsal bar ma byas ci yod pa //
T02TD1853E:16b-22: des na de shes bla ma yang dag par //
T02TD1853E:16b-23: mnyes byas de nyid 'dod pas yang dag long //
T02TD1853E:16b-24: 'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pas yang dag spyod pa la //
T02TD1853E:16b-25: snying po'i snying po 'bras gsol yang dag spyong //
T02TD1853E:16b-26: mtha' yi phar son bla chen yon tan ma lus gter //
T02TD1853E:16b-27: de las 'di ni yang dag zhal rnyed byas //
T02TD1853E:16b-28: de bas rnal 'byor chen po rgyud kyi don rnams ni //
T02TD1853E:16b-29: mi 'tsham par ni snang yang nyi ma'i dpes //
T02TD1853E:16b-30: rang dang gzhan gyi don byed nus pas na //
T02TD1853E:16b-31: rnal 'byor 'gas ni shin tu 'bad dgos so //
T02TD1853E:16b-32: the tshom som nyi med par dad pa yis //
T02TD1853E:16b-33: 'di don grub pas yang dag blang byas nas //
T02TD1853E:16b-34: shes rab kyis ni yang dang yang du rung //
T02TD1853E:16b-35: dpyad pas bdag la gnyis med ye shes che //
T02TD1853E:16b-36: chu gtsang nang du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar //
T02TD1853E:17a-0: 'byung 'gyur 'di la the tshom ma byed cig /'di ni rang bzhin grub pa'i man ngag @17a * //
T02TD1853E:17a-2: brgyud pa'i bla ma yang dag rab bsten dang //
T02TD1853E:17a-3: rang gi bsod nams tshogs ni sngon bskyed pas //
T02TD1853E:17a-4: rtogs par rab tu 'gyur ba ma rtogs par //
T02TD1853E:17a-5: bsod nams chung ba'i mi yis bskal ba dpag med par //
T02TD1853E:17a-6: 'di ni rtogs par mi 'gyur 'di don ma rtogs na //
T02TD1853E:17a-7: rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya de la mi bya'o //
T02TD1853E:17a-8: de ltar rab tu shes par byas nas su //
T02TD1853E:17a-9: rdzogs pa chen po ye shes spyi yi gzugs //
T02TD1853E:17a-10: yongs su dag sku rdo rje 'chang chen po //
T02TD1853E:17a-11: dpal ldan kun gyi ngo bo rim gnyis 'dis //
T02TD1853E:17a-12: sdug bsngal lam bcas bskal ba gsum du yang //
T02TD1853E:17a-13: rang gi rjes mthun byang chub bla dang bcas //
T02TD1853E:17a-14: thob nas de bde cung tsam rab tshogs pa //
T02TD1853E:17a-15: rnal 'byor de yis ci phyir de mi sgom //
T02TD1853E:17a-16: dad dang brtson 'grus ting 'dzin shes rab dang //
T02TD1853E:17a-17: dran pa'i blo yis gong gi rim pa ltar //
T02TD1853E:17a-18: yid dga'i gnas brten kun du bzang po mchog / lam 'di bsgom par bya 'kho na'o //
T02TD1853E:17a-19: de ltar zhal gyi lung bsdus las byung dge ba dri med pa //
T02TD1853E:17a-20: kha ba zla ba'i 'od ltar rab tu dkar ba de yis ni //
T02TD1853E:17a-21: 'di don ma 'ongs 'gro ba skal ldan dga' dang phrad gyur nas //
T02TD1853E:17a-22: rab tu dang ba'i dad pas len cing 'di mchog rab bsgom shog / blugs dang gtor dang dag par byas pas slob dpon cher 'gyur te //
T02TD1853E:17a-23: thams cad kun gyi rgyud 'dzin gzhan rnams rgyud kun la sbyor ba'i //
T02TD1853E:17a-24: dang po'i rim pa rab rtogs dri ma rnams ni dag byas te //
T02TD1853E:17a-25: ye shes sgyu ma'i snod du rung bar rnal 'byor de 'gyur shog / snying rje ldan pa'i bla ma'i zhabs la gus par rab ldan pas //
T02TD1853E:17a-26: ri bong 'dzin pa'i gzugs kyis rang rgyud rab tu smin byas te //
T02TD1853E:17a-27: zhing dag byas pas chos kun sgyu sogs don du rab rtogs nas //
T02TD1853E:17a-28: byams pa la sogs bzhin du sems can kun gyis 'gro bar shog / lhan cig byed pas byin brlabs rje btsun thugs rje chen po yis //
T02TD1853E:17a-29: dga' ba rnyed pas chos kun dag pa'i ngo bo chen po mchog / ji bzhin gnas pa'i don la mi slu bcu drug thig le cha //
T02TD1853E:17a-30: ngal so las thob man ngag chen po rab tu rnyed par shog / de rnyed de la sems ni yang dag rab tu mgu gyur nas //
T02TD1853E:17a-31: mgrin pa dma' bas brtags nas rang rig chos kyi sku ni yang dag thob //
T02TD1853E:17b-0: sku dang gsung dang thugs dang dpag @17b med sprul pa'i gzugs kyis ni //
T02TD1853E:17b-1: khams gsum bkang nas sems can thams cad srid las sgrol bar shog / rim pa gnyis pa'i de kho na nyid bsgom pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhal gyi lung //
T02TD1853E:17b-2: dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon chen po lha sangs rgyas dpal gyi ye shes zhabs kyis bsdus pa /
T02TD1853E:17b-3: zhal nas zhal du brgyud pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1853E:17b-5: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ka ma la gu hya dang /
T02TD1853E:17b-6: bod kyi lo ts'a ba chen po mnga' bdag lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
